264b6(mdo 'grel): nga ro'i mdo dang/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ 'phags pa chos bcu pa la sogs pa'i mdo las 'byung ba dang 'gal ba ste/ de dag las ni dgra bcom pa kho na nying mtshams sbyor bar nye bar bstan gyi/ phyir mi 'ong ba
264b7(mdo 'grel): dag ni ma yin no/ /de bzhin du 'phags pa dpal 'phreng seng+ge'i mdo ni sngar bshad zin so/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang ngo?/ des dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyed na skye ba mchis
265a1(mdo 'grel): par ji ltar 'thob bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni mkhyen bzhin du 'di skye bar lung ma bstan lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa da ni las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang
265a2(mdo 'grel): du song ba'i skye ba 'dogs par mi mdzad kyi/ 'on kyang 'di'i skye ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mya ngan las 'das par bsngo ba yin par 'dogs par mdzad do zhes gsungs so/ /'phags pa chos bcu pa las kyang/ bcom ldan 'das nyan
265a3(mdo 'grel): thos zag pa ma mchis pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yang dag par chad pa rnams rigs mchis su lags kyang ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan
265a4(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir dpe nyon cig/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgyal po rgyal rigs kyi spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i bu zhig bzo'i gnas thams cad slob bar rgyur la/ de yang dbang po rtul la
265a5(mdo 'grel): dbang po rno ba ma yin pas phyis bslab par bya ba gang yin pa de ni sngar slob/ sngar bslab par bya ba gang yin pa de ni phyis slob par gyur na rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ 'on kyang gzhi nges de rgyal po'i bu ma yin no zhes bya
265a6(mdo 'grel): bar brjod dam/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa de lta ma lags te/ rgyal po'i bu zhes brjod par bgyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems
265a7(mdo 'grel): dpa' dbang po rtul po rigs dang ldan pa sngar bsgom lam gyis nyon mongs pa zad par byed cing/ phyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par gsungs so/ gang yang
265b1(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba 'di kun sangs rgyas 'gyur ba de/ zhes bya ba 'di'i don ni skye bo nye ba la bltos te/ dgongs pa yin no zhes bya bar rnam par 'chad par byed pa de yang rang dga' tsam gyi nye bar brtags pa yin pa'i phyir rigs pa ma yin pa nyid de/ 'gro ba ma
265b2(mdo 'grel): lus pa rung ba nyid du gzigs nas de skad du gsung bar 'gyur na'ang de'i tshe 'gal ba ci zhig yod de/ de skad du 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin la sogs pa las/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la sogs pa'i mtshan brjod pa thos pa
265b3(mdo 'grel): tsam gyis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon skrun pa'i phyir sems can thams cad khyad par med par phyir mi ldog pa nyid du lung bstan gyi/ skye bo nye ba las bltos pa ni ma yin no/ /de'i phyir gang gis brjod pa thos pa dang/ nyan pa dang/ nyan par
265b4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba de dag la yang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon yod pa nyid de/ khyed kyang dri ma rnams ni glo bur ba yin pa'i phyir sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar 'dod de/ de'i phyir 'gro ba ma lus pa der rung ba nyid pas de las dgongs te/ de skad
265b5(mdo 'grel): du bshad par rigs pa nyid de/ sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no zhes bya ba 'dis kyang/ thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi go 'phang thob par rung ba nyid du yongs su bstan te/
265b6(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra ni chos kyi dbyings gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba yin par brjod par bzhed pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad du bstan pas ni thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
265b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i byang chub kyi rang bzhin nyid du yongs su bstan pa yin no/ /gzhan yang theg pa zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba'i lam de kho na nyid shes pa'i bdag nyid la bya ste/ 'di nas 'gro ba'i phyir ro/ /de kho na nyid shes ba
266a1(mdo 'grel): kho nas thar ba thob bar 'gyur gyi/ gzhan gyis ni ma yin no/ /de kho na nyid de yang gcig kho nar zad de/ thug ba med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /lta ba tha dad kyang dngos po'i de kho na nyid du ma'i bdag nyid du
266a2(mdo 'grel): 'brang ba ni med do/ /de'i phyir de kho na nyid ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i yul can gyi ye shes kyang ngo bo nyid gcig pa kho na yin no/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de kho na nyid yang dag par thugs su chud pa rnams kyi ye shes gang yin
266a3(mdo 'grel): pa de yang de kho na nyid mngon du byed pa'i yul can yin te/ rnam pa thams cad du kun tu rmongs pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro/ /nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dag gis ni de kho na nyid rtogs par mi 'gyur te/ ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de
266a4(mdo 'grel): lta na ni thams cad de kho na nyid mthong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de lta bas na chos dang gang zag la bdag med pa'i de kho na nyid mngon sum pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de nyid mya ngan las 'das pa thob bar byed pa'i yang dag pa'i lam yin gyi/ gzhan
266a5(mdo 'grel): ni ma yin pa de'i phyir theg pa ni gcig kho nar zad do/ /de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis lam gzhan gyis thar pa med ces bstan te/ 'phags pa langkar gshegs pa las/ ji skad du blo gros chen po gzhan dag ni chos thams cad rgyu la rag
266a6(mdo 'grel): las par mthong nas mya ngan las 'da' o snyam du blo 'byung ste/ blo gros chen po chos la bdag med pa mthong pa med pas thar pa ni med do/ /blo gros chen po 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg ba mngon par rtogs pa'i rigs can gyi nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa
266a7(mdo 'grel): la nges par 'byung ba'i blo yin te/ blo gros chen po 'di la lta ba ngan pa bzlog pa'i phyir rnal 'byor tu bya'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang/ rab 'byor gnyis ni dngos po yin no/ /gnyis su med ba ni
266b1(mdo 'grel): dngos po med pa yin no/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gnyis su zhes bgyi ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs su 'du shes pa ni gnyis yin no/ /de bzhin du phung po dang/ khams dang/ reg pa dang/ tshor
266b2(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ khams drug dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ bsam gtan dang/ gzugs med pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ bde ba dang/ sems can la sogs par 'du shes pa ni zhes rgyas par bstan nas/ ji
266b3(mdo 'grel): tsam du 'du shes pa de tsam du gnyis yin no/ /ji tsam du gnyis yin pa de tsam du dngos po yin no/ /ji tsam du dngos po yin pa de tsam du 'khor ba yin no/ /ji tsam du 'khor ba yin pa de tsam du sems can rnams yongs su mi 'grol lo/ /de lta bas
266b4(mdo 'grel): na rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar gnyis su shes pa la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod ba yang med par rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so/ /'phags pa bden pa gnyis la 'jug pa las kyang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni dngos por mngon par zhen pa yin pa'i
266b5(mdo 'grel): phyir chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med par bsgom pa kho nas nyon mongs pa spong gi lam gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bstan te/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na nyon mongs pa rnams 'dul bar 'gyur/ ji ltar na nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su shes par
266b6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ don dam par chos thams cad shin tu ma skyes shing ma byung ba'i dngos po dag la/ kun rdzob tu yod pa ma yin pa las phyin ci log ste/ yod pa ma yin pa las phyin ci log pa de las kun tu rtog pa dang/
266b7(mdo 'grel): rnam par rtog pa 'byung ngo/ /kun tu rtog pa dang/ rnam par rtog pa de las tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa 'byung ngo/ /tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa de las bdag du sgro 'dogs pa 'byung ngo/ /bdag tu sgro 'dogs pa de las
267a1(mdo 'grel): lta ba kun nas dkris pa 'byung ngo/ /lta ba kun nas dkris pa de las nyon mongs pa rnams 'byung ngo/ /lha'i bu gang gis chos thams cad don dam par shin tu ma skyes pa dang/ ma byung bar rab tu shes pa med pa'i tshul
267a2(mdo 'grel): gyis rab tu shes pa de ni don dam par phyin ci log pa ma yin no/ /gang zhig don dam par phyin ci ma log pa de ni kun tu mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /gang mi rtog kun tu mi rtog pa de ni tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no/ /gang tshul bzhin du zhugs
267a3(mdo 'grel): pa de ni don dam par yod pa ma yin pa la sgro 'dogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang don dam par yod pa ma yin pa la sgro 'dogs par mi 'gyur ba de la lta ba kun nas ldang bar mi 'gyur te/ don dam par mya ngan las 'das par lta ba kun nas ldang
267a4(mdo 'grel): ba'i bar du yang mi 'gyur ro/ /skye ba med pa la gnas pa de nyid kyi nyon mongs pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i tshul gyis shin tu mthong bar blta ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa 'dul ba zhes bya'o/ /lha'i bu gang gi tshe nyon mongs pa rnams snang ba
267a5(mdo 'grel): med pa'i shes rab dang ye shes kyis don dam par shin tu stong pa dang/ shin tu mtshan ma med pa dang/ don dam par dngos po rnams shin tu ma skyes shing ma byung bar rab tu shes pa med pa'i tshul gyis/ rab tu shes pa de'i tshe lha'i
267a6(mdo 'grel): bu nyon mongs pa rnams rab tu shes pa med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su shes pa yin no/ /lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na gang sbrul gyi rigs 'don pa des ni dug zhi bar byed do/ /lha'i bu gang zhig nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rigs rab tu shes pa
267a7(mdo 'grel): de ni nyon mongs pa rnams shin tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rigs gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu don dam par chos thams cad
267b1(mdo 'grel): shin tu ma skyes shing ma byung ba'i dngos po dag la kun tu rtog pa gang yin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rigs yin no zhes gang gsungs pa yin no/ /de lta bas na gang nges par legs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par 'gyur ba ni dngos po ma lus pa
267b2(mdo 'grel): stong ba nyid du sgom pa 'di kho nar zad pas de'i phyir de don du gnyer ba bdag legs su dga' ba rnams kyis lam ngan pa la rnam par rtog pa thag bsrings te spangs nas de nyid bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis rigs pa dang lung gi sgron ma'i
267b3(mdo 'grel): tshogs kyis gsal rab tu brjod pa'i phyir dang/ skye bo mkhas pa'i 'dron pa ma lus pa sa bgrod cing rjes su bgrod ba'i phyir gus par rtag tu bsten par bya'o/ /de bas na theg pa gcig pa nyid dang/ chos thams cad don dam par ngo bo
267b4(mdo 'grel): nyid med ba nyid grub pa kho na yin no// //bstan bcos dbu ma snang ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ka ma la shI las mdzad ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dpal brtsegs
267b5(mdo 'grel): kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //*/ (/de nyid snang pa ka ma la shI las mdzed pa bzhugs so/) /rgya gar skad du/ tatwA lo ka na nA ma pra ka ra Na/ bod skad du/ de kho na nyid snang ba zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa/ sangs rgyas
267b6(mdo 'grel): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag bdud rtsi shin tu brnyes nas ci bzhed gsol/ /skye shi mi mnga' go 'phang brnyes te thugs rje yis/ /'gro ba kun la de dag thob mdzad bzhugs pa gang/ /de la
267b7(mdo 'grel): btud nas yang dag de nyid rtogs par bya/ /gang phyir 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /rmongs pa'i ngo bo zhags pas bcings/ /yang dag rtogs pas thar pa zhes/ /mkhas pa rnams ni rab tu gsungs/ /thar pa 'dod pa rnams
268a1(mdo 'grel): gyis ni/ /don med brtsad pa 'dir mi bya/ /'ga' zhig rmongs pa med pa ni/ /dman pa'i dngos dag mi tshol lo/ /skye ba sdug bsngal rtsa ba bas/ /de ni dman ba nyid du bshad/ /thog ma med pa'i mi shes
268a2(mdo 'grel): pa /de yang rtsa bar mkhas pas bstan/ /rgyu la rag las skye ba'i phyir/ /gnyen po dag kyang yod pa'i phyir/ /ye shes snang ba byung ba na/ /mun ba bzhin du de spong ngo/ /mi shes rang bzhin rmongs pa ni/ /spang dgos de bas gus
268a3(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ /yang dag snang ba skyed pa'i phyir/ /thar ba 'dod pas mchog brtson bya/ /gzugs la sogs ba gsal 'di dag /byis ba kun la grags pa gang/ /de nyid ji ste yang dag na /lus can thams cad grol bar 'gyur /
268a4(mdo 'grel): mkhas pa rnams kyi nga rgyal can/ /kun gyis de 'dir mthong na ni/ /yang dag so sor smra ba bas/ /brtsod pa sna tshogs mi 'gyur ro/ /'chad pa po dag rnams la yang/ /phan tshun 'gal ba srid pa'i phyir/ /gzhan gyi man ngag tsam gyis na/
268a5(mdo 'grel): yang dag gtan la phebs pa'ang med/ /gcig la gcig ni mi mthun zhing/ /bdag nyid ngo bo phan tshun du/ /'gal bzhin du ni yang dag pa/ /du ma nyid du 'gyur mi srid/ /de bas rtog ldan rnams kyis ni/ /rang gi rigs pas de
268a6(mdo 'grel): dpyod la/ /lung dang rigs bar ldan ba yis/ /bstan por gyur nas bsgom par bya/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po rnams/ /yang dag nyid du khas len gang/ /de dag las ni 'grub ba yi/ /tshad ma yod dam med bar byed//
268a7(mdo 'grel): yod dang med pa'i tha snyad ni/ /tshad ma la brten mkhas pa rnams/ /de med gyur na de dag gis/ rtog pa ldan pa spangs pa yin/ /'dod pa tsam las dbyung phyir dang/ /de las bzlog pa'i don gyis kyang/ /de yang mi 'grub thal 'gyur
268b1(mdo 'grel): phyir/ /tshig tsam gyis kyang de mi 'grub/ /tshad ma rjes su 'gro ba dang/ /ldog pa gnyis kyis yang dag par/ /tha snyad dag la khyab na yang/ /dngos por smra ba legs par gnas/ /rtag pa la sogs dag gis kyang/ /sgra la khyab par
268b2(mdo 'grel): thal 'gyur phyir/ /'di ltar ldog pa 'ba' zhig las/ /khyab pa grub pa ma yin no/ /des na'ang rjes su 'gro med na/ /ldog ba 'di ni yod min te/ /de dngos rjes su mi 'brang gang/ /de ldog can du de mi 'gyur/ /de bas khyab par 'dod pa
268b3(mdo 'grel): yis/ /nges par rjes su 'gro bar 'dod/ /de grub na yang tshad ma las/ /dngos po gtan du grub ba yin/ /'di ltar gang na yod ces pa'i/ /tha snyad tshad ma yod pa yi/ /rjes su 'brang de gar bsgrub na/ /nged kyi dngos po de nyid grub/ /
268b4(mdo 'grel): khyab ba de ni grub na yang/ /yang dag dngos po des mi 'grub/ /'di ltar khyab byed yod pa las/ /khyab bya thams cad mngon pa med/ /shiM sha pa dang seng ldeng sogs/ /'di ltar shing nyid kyis khyab kyang/ /de tsam gyis na de
268b5(mdo 'grel): dag ci/ /de las nges par 'grub 'gyur ram/ /de bzhin tshad ma 'jug na yang/ /dngos po yod pa'i tha snyad 'di/ /yang dag don gyi yul can du/ /khyed la nges par 'grub pa med/ /bstan pa 'di ni nor pa ste/ /shing ni seng
268b6(mdo 'grel): ldeng la sogs la/ /thun mong yin pas de las ni/ /bye brag gsal bar rtog mi 'gyur/ /tshad ma dag gis dngos po yis/ /ngo bo 'das nas 'jug pa med/ /gzhan duAng rab tu 'jug na ni/ /de ni tshad mar mi rung ngo/ /'di
268b7(mdo 'grel): ltar dngos pos tshad ma khyab/ /de yis tha snyad la yang khyab/ /dngos pos khyab pa'i tshad mas byung/ /de yang bzhan du mi 'jug go /'jig rten kun rdzob bden don gyi/ /yul can dag kyang srid pa'i phyir/ /de phyir yang dag dngos
269a1(mdo 'grel): po yis/ /tshad ma khyab par mi 'grub po/ /ji ste yang dag dngos po la/ /tshad ma thams cad yod na ni/ /kun gyis yang dag nyid mthong phyir/ /'phags pa'i lam ni dgos pa med/ /'bad pa ma byas grol
269a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i phyir/ /thar 'dod rnams kyi tshangs spyod dang/ /bsnyen gnas la sogs don med de/ /nyon mongs skyes pa kho nar zad/ /rnal 'byor pa yis mngon sum las/ /gzhan gyi dbang po'i shes khyad med/ /rab tu grub pa'i don dag la/ /
269a3(mdo 'grel): yang dag rtogs 'dod rtsod mi 'gyur/ /tshad ma'i mtshan nyid bstan bcos dag /rab tu byed pa don med cing/ /phan tshun dag tu dang 'gal yi/ /mtshan nyid dag kyang byed mi 'gyur/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mdza' / /phan tshun
269a4(mdo 'grel): tha dad med par 'gyur/ /tshad ma kun gyi tshad ma nyid/ /bdag nyid la ni grub par thal/ /don dam ba yi dngos po yi/ /ngo bo 'das nas mi 'jug ste/ /gzhan duAng tshad ma 'jug na ni/ /de ni ji ltar tshad ma nyid/ /rmi lam sogs
269a5(mdo 'grel): bzhin brdzun pa nyid/ /'dod pa'i don la mi bslu phyir/ /'jig rten dngos la mtshan ma yod/ /tha snyad du ni brjod par bya/ /de nyid ji ste don dam yin/ /ming tsam zad pa bzlog med de/ /rang dga' dag gis byung ba la/ /de ni su
269a6(mdo 'grel): zhig zlog par byed/ /'on kyang rmi lam byed pa ni/ /brdzun pa'i dngos po rnams la yang/ /'dod pa'i don byed sgrub nus pa/ /'di ltar dmigs shing snang yin na/ /de yang don dam cir mi 'dod/ /'gal ba'i phyir ro zhe na ni/ de bzhin
269a7(mdo 'grel): gzhan du gnyid sad la/ /de dang mthun na ci phyir 'dod/ /de la mi bslu ba dag kyang/ /ma sad pa dang gnyi ga mthun/ /sad pa dag gi bslu byed pa/ /gnyi ga yang ni mthun pa nyid/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kun/ /rmi lam lta
269b1(mdo 'grel): bur rab tu bstan/ /dbang po lnga po de dag gis/ /dngos po cung zad mthong ba med/ /ji ste don byed nus pa yi/ /snang ba tsam yang mi 'dod na/ /'khrul pa'i phyir na 'di dag ni/ /don dam nyid kyi mtshan nyid min/ /rmi lam dag na dngos po'i don
269b2(mdo 'grel): shes pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin/ /shel sgong bzhin du dag pa yi/ /shes pa yin zhes nye bar brjod/ /sngon po la sogs gzugs sna tshogs/ /de la de ni gang nas 'ongs/ /'phrul pas yin na'ang 'khrul 'di ci/ /'khrul pa shes pa nyid can 'ang?//
269b3(mdo 'grel): de las de nyid yin zhes pa/ /mchog tu de ni legs par bshad/ /'on te snga ma'i rnam par shes/ /shes pa phyi ma'i rgyu yin na/ /'khrul ba de ni de dag las/ /rgyu med par ni ji ltar 'byung/ /sngon po la sogs de 'byung na/ /'byung la rag ste 'on
269b4(mdo 'grel): kyang ni/ /shes dang tha dad ma yin phyir/ /ji ltar gcig la sna tshogs nyid/ /rnam par shes pa du ma'ang/ /'byung bar rtag tu rigs pa min/ /lus med yul na mi gnas phyir/ /yul na bkram ste 'dug pa med/ /de la de ni sna tshogs pa/ /  
269b5(mdo 'grel): brdzun pa nyid chos 'dod na yang/ /brdzun dang cig shos 'gal ba dag /gcig po nyid du ji ltar rung/ /brdzun pa rnams kyang rgyu dag las/ /'byung bar ji ste 'dod na ni/ /bden pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dag /dngos po gzhan la ci zhig yod/
269b6(mdo 'grel): rang bar dbyer med sna tshogs pa'i/ /sngo sogs brdzun pa'i rang bzhin na/ /rnam par shes pa'ang brdzun nyid du/ /ci'i phyir gsang bstod brjod mi bya/ /shes pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/ /ji ste de'i bdag ma yin te/ /gzhan yin de la de bzhin
269b7(mdo 'grel): du/ /ji ltar so sor snang bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang gang de sngo la sogs/ /'di dag brdzun pa nyid brjod na/ /de nyid mtshan nyid 'khrul pa yi/ /yul du ma gyur ma yin nam/ /rmi lam dag la de las gzhan/ /khyed kyi 'dod pa'i don bsgrub cing/ /
270a1(mdo 'grel): gang gis mtshan nyid 'khrul bar ni/ /mi 'gyur bzung du yod ma yin/ /ji ste don byed rung ba la/ /de dag khong du chud pa de/ /de tshe yang dag rtogs par 'gyur/ /gang gi ngo bo rtogs pas ni/ /rnal 'byor srid par
270a2(mdo 'grel): 'khyam las grol/ /'dir ni de nyid don dam du/ /rtag pa'i yul du bya ba yin/ /'gro la grol ba thob 'gyur zhing/ /thams cad thar par thal ba'i phyir/ /dngos tsam rab tu grub pa las/ /'dod pa'i don byed rung ba min/ /de bas
270a3(mdo 'grel): 'dod don mi bslu ba/ /tshad ma'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes/ /'jig rten pa la'ang rab grub phyir/ /thun mong yin par gnas pa yin/ /des na yod pa'i tha snyad sogs/ /khyab pa yin yang yang dag don/ /'grub min ji ltar de las ni/ /
270a4(mdo 'grel): dngos por smra ba legs par gnas/ /tshu rol mthong ba thams cad kyi/ /sems ni de la nor pa'i phyir/ /yang dag dngos po cung zad kyang/ /mngon sum dag gis grub pa med/ /rtog dang bral la ma 'khrul ba/ /mngon sum zhes ni de
270a5(mdo 'grel): brjod la/ /tshu rol mthong ba kun gyis kyang/ /yang dag mtshan nyid 'khrul ba med/ /yang dag mngon sum rtogs pa de/ /ji ltar tshu rol mthong zhes bya/ /cha shas 'khrul med rang bzhin na/ /dbang po'i rnam par shes pa dag /spyi don
270a6(mdo 'grel): yin phyir nyer rjod phyir/ /rang gi mtshan nyid spyod yul min/ /ji ste gzhan las bzlog pa yi/ /spyi ste yul zhes mi brjod na/ /gzhan du gcig gi dngos po la/ /ji ltar cha shas rtag tu yod/ /sgra la sogs pa'i chos can la/ /tshad ma
270a7(mdo 'grel): gzhan dag mi bslu phyir/ /mngon sum rtogs pa'i bdag nyid las/ /yang dag rnam par nges pa med/ /rang gi mtshan nyid rnam pa kun/ /'di dag gzung nyid ma yin nam/ /'on kyang zin dang bral ba'i phyir/ /rnam pa thams cad nges
270b1(mdo 'grel): ba med/ /don du gnyer dang goms 'dus las/ /sogs pa'ang de yi rgyu yin phyir/ /'di ltar myong ba zhes bya bas/ /nges par skye bar mi srid do/ /rnam pa thams cad gzung na yang/ /gang na don du gnyer sogs rgyu/ /med pa don? phyin ci log / 
270b2(mdo 'grel): 'khrul pa'i sa bon dag las skye/ /rjes su dpag pa rnams kyis ni/ /sgro 'dogs de tsam nyi tshe zhig /bsam pa bsgrub par bya yin gyi/ /mngon sum spyod yul dngos po min/ /rnam pa thams cad nges pa dag /ji ste de las ma skyes na/ /de ni gzung
270b3(mdo 'grel): ba yin no zhes/ /mna' chung rnams kyis bskyal bar bgyis/ /tshad ma rnams ni gzhan dag las/ /yang dag dngos po grub na ni/ /mngon sum des ni rnam pa kun/ /gzung zhes bya ba'i rigs pa snyam/ /ma grub na yang rnam nges pa/ /der ma
270b4(mdo 'grel): skyes par gzung ngo zhes/ /khyod kyi tha mal sems kyis ni/ /brjod par ji ltar rigs pa yin/ /don byed pa rnams snang ba yi/ /shes pas kyang ni 'khrul pa'i phyir/ /gzung ba nyid du des min te/ /ji ltar sngar ni bshad pa bzhin/ /'ga' 
270b5(mdo 'grel): zhig tu ni yang dag dngos/ /ji ste lan 'ga' mthong gyur na/ /don byed pas ni de bsgrub ces/ /rnam par nges pa de dag rigs/ /pha rol ma yin mthong rnams kyis/ /gang tshe lan 'ga' de gcig kyang/ /mthong ba med pas de bas na/ /rnam
270b6(mdo 'grel): par nges par ji ltar bya/ /sprul pa rnams kyang sna tshogs pa'i/ /don rnams bya ba byed par brjod/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs la yang mthong/ /de'i phyir nges par gyur pa med/ /phyi rol don thob mtshan nyid kyi/ /mi bslu ba ni don grub med//
270b7(mdo 'grel): 'di ltar snang ba ngo bo ni/ /rmi lam sogs pa la yang yod/ /shes pa lnga la khyad med pa'i/ /gzhan las ji ltar nges pa yin/ /yul ni tha dad yin phyir yang/ /de sgrub don la mi bslu ba de/ /sngar myong ba la mi bslu ba/ /skad cig pa la
271a1(mdo 'grel): shin tu dkon/ /skad cig ma yin rnams la yang/ /gang na don byed yod mi srid/ /ji ste rtogs par byed pa rnams/ /tha dad med par zhen pa yis/ /'dod na gnyis la gcig don te/ /brtags pa 'di yin yang dag min/ /
271a2(mdo 'grel): rang gi mtshan nyid ji bzhin du/ /ji ste dbang pos ma gzung na/ /de tshe yul de nges pa nas/ /de ni ji ltar rigs pa yin/ /yul gyi don la mngon sum dag /ji ste sgro 'dogs srid na yang/ /rang gi mtshan nyid dngos po la/ /de ni ji ltar tshad ma
271a3(mdo 'grel): yin/ /de bas de yi sems kyis ni/ /yang dag dngos po rtog med kyi/ /smig rgyu bzhin du gang dag gis/ /'di la sgro 'dogs byed par 'gyur/ /sgro 'dogs pa yis thams cad du/ /sems kyi rked pas gtubs pa dag /zla ba gnyis sogs
271a4(mdo 'grel): mngon sum gyi/ /shes pa dag dang ci mi mtshungs/ /gang tshe rtag tu yang dag nyid/ /log par sgro 'dogs mun pas g.yogs/ /mngon sum mi bslu yin pa las/ /rnam par nges pa de ni med/ /gzhan yang dngos po'i ngo bo nyid/ /rtag
271a5(mdo 'grel): pa'am mi rtag gcig tu 'gyur/ /phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i phyir/ /phung po gsum pa yod pa min/ /phan tshun yongs su spangs la sogs/ /'gal ba rab tu grub bya'i phyir/ /ji ste tshad ma khas len na/ /nged kyi dngos po 'gal ba
271a6(mdo 'grel): grub/ /de mi rigs te tshad ma yis/ /dngos po rnams kyis spyi 'grub phyir/ /khyab par dngos po mi 'grub ces/ /gong du rab tu bsgrubs pa yin/ /dngos po rnams kyi 'gal ba ni/ /tha snyad pa yi tshad ma nyid/ /'di la brten nas
271a7(mdo 'grel): brjod pas na/ /de phyir yang dag rtogs pa min/ /'di ltar mar me la sogs pa/ /skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can rnams/ /brten pa'i rnam pas rnam gcad pas/ /'gal bar rtogs pa rnams la bltos/ /gang tshe rnam pa rnam bcad pa//
271b1(mdo 'grel): med na med par ngas pa yis/ /chos de gang yin de gnyis ni/ /mtshan nyid kyis ni 'gal bar 'dod/ /skye 'jig dag dang 'brel ba ni/ /sgyu ma la sogs la yang yod/ /de tsam gyis na de dag ci/ /yang dag dngos po nyid yin nam/ /shes
271b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i rnam pa nor phyir dang/ /phyi rol don yang ma grub phyir/ /mar me la sogs rnams la yang/ /yang dag dngos po cung zad med/ /de lta bas na 'jig rten gyi/ /don la brten nas 'gal ba dag /don dam nyid la 'jug bya'i phyir/ /rigs
271b3(mdo 'grel): pa shes pa rnams kyis bzhag /de bzhin gzhan yang 'gal ba dag /tha snyad yin par shes par byos/ /yang dag dngos po nyid la ni/ /'gal ba nyid ni 'gal yang med/ /tshad ma'i mtshan nyid 'di dag kyang/ /yang dag nyid la 'jug
271b4(mdo 'grel): bya phyir/ /tha snyad pa ni yin no zhes/ /bstan pa de phyir 'dod par gyis/ /gzhan du byis pa gnag rdzi sogs/ /bud med rnams la grags pa nyid/ /man ngag med par du sogs las/ /ci phyir me phyogs nges mi 'gyur/ /tha snyad rnams la
271b5(mdo 'grel): ma brten na/ /thabs gzhan dag la brten byas kyang/ /rang dang gzhan gyis yang dag pa/ /rnam par dbye bar nus pa min/ /rtags dang rtags can 'gal ba dang/ /de bzhin khyab bya khyab byed pa/ /yang dag don la ma brtags kyi/ /
271b6(mdo 'grel): don dam pa la 'jug bya'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'jig rten grags pa la/ /brten nas de bzhin bsgrub bya dang/ /sgrub byed 'di dag gnas par ni/ /de bas thams cad brjod pa yin/ /de bas khyab dang 'gal la sogs/ /ma grub pa
271b7(mdo 'grel): sogs gang go la ba/ /de dag thams cad 'khyam pa zhes/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis shes par bya/ /gtan du ma grub gang yin pa/ /de la brgal? bar rigs pa yin/ /yang dag brten nas pa rtsod pa ni/ /mi 'dod thal bar 'gyur ba
272a1(mdo 'grel): med/ /de la mi rtag dngos po'i bdag /yang dag mngon sum shes pa med/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu rtogs grub na/ /de ni rab tu 'grub pa yin/ /gzhan gyi bdag nyid 'bras bu dang/ /rgyur gyur pa la rnam shes kyi/ /
272a2(mdo 'grel): gang phyir 'dzin par mi rigs na/ /mngon sum nyid du de ma grub/ /rnam par shes pa 'dra tsam gyis/ /gzhan dag shes pa ma yin te/ /de lta yin na 'dra pa kun/ /phan yon rig pa nyid du 'gyur/ /'dra gang shes pa'i ngo bo zhes/ /
272a3(mdo 'grel): bye brag rung ba ma yin te/ /rang gi ngo bo gnas pa yi/ /shes bya khyab pa'i bdag por rung/ /shes pa'i ngo bo bye brag gis/ /bdag nyid nye bar gnas na yang/ /de lta yin yang mi phan phyir/ /gzhan dag ji ltar 'dzin par
272a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /'dra ba shes pa'i ngo bo'i phyir/ /ji ste rig par 'gyur na yang/ /zla ba la sogs lta ba na/ /phan tshun de shes cis ma gyur/ /de las byung ba yin na zhes/ /de ltar khyad par gzhan dag kyang/ /ji ste brjod par byed na ni//
272a5(mdo 'grel): 'on kyang 'dod pa sgrub mi byed/ /dngos po rnams kyi don byed pa/ /rang gi dngos dang 'brel bas na/ /skyes bu 'dod pa'i rjes 'brengs pa'i/ /bye brag rnams las ji ltar 'gyur/ /rnam shes de las byung na yang/ /rang gi ngo bor de/
272a6(mdo 'grel): gnas las/ /ji ltar gzhan las mngon sum du/ /byed ces bya ba 'di yang smros/ /gzhan gyi ngo bo mngon sum du/ /grub na de dang 'dra ba dang/ /de las byung ba 'grub par 'gyur/ /des ni bye brag grub pa med/ /mtshungs pa'i
272a7(mdo 'grel): don stobs byung ba yi/ /rnam shes de ma thag pa dang/ /de 'dra de las byung ba'i phyir/ /shes pa rig par thal bar 'gyur/ /sems la kun tu sna tshogs pa'i/ /rnam pa 'di dag snang ba'i phyir/ /cha shas can gyi ngo bo drang/ /
272b1(mdo 'grel): 'dra ba 'brel ba ma yin no/ /sna tshogs pa yang gcig pa min/ /de yi yon tan sna tshogs med/ /rten la 'dzin pa med par ni/ /'di la 'dzin pa mi snang ngo/ /sna tshogs rnam pas dben pa yi/ /rten ni so sor snang ba med/ /gzhan yang
272b2(mdo 'grel): rab rib ltas ngan dang/ /mig ser sogs pas nyams pa'i mig /gang phyir dngos po gcig la yang/ /nye ring la sogs bye brag gis/ /mi mthun rnam par myong ba yis/ /shes pa dag kyang snang ba yin/ /de la de dag de snyed kyi/ /dngos
272b3(mdo 'grel): po tha dad yod pa min/ /mi mthun chos can gcig yin na/ /thams cad gcig par thal bar 'gyur/ /gcig na lhan cig skye ba dang/ /'jig dang gnas pa can du 'gyur/ /de phyir 'dra ba ma grub ste/ /don med par yang snang ba yin/ /
272b4(mdo 'grel): rmi lam sogs na sngo sogs kyi/ /ngo bo snang ba'i myong ba dang/ /'khrul par 'gyur ba de yi phyir/ /'di las gzhan rig 'grub pa med/ /chung ba'i ngo bo'ang don min te/ /de shes so sor myong med phyir/ /gcig pu phra ba de snang ba'i/ /
272b5(mdo 'grel): rnam pa sems kyi myong ba med/ /re re dag ni tshogs pa yi/ /yul nyid yin par khas blangs du/ /rtag tu gong bu'i ngo bo yi/ /snang ba'i shes pa myong ba yin/ /'dus pa can las 'dus pa yi/ /mtshan nyid tha dad yod pa min/ /brtags
272b6(mdo 'grel): pa'ang dngos po med pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar de ni so sor snang/ /ji ste phra ba'i dngos 'dzin ni/ /bar med gnas pa gang gis 'dzin/ /rags pa 'khrul pa yin na yang/ /ji ltar 'di dag tshad ma yin/ /yid la yod na ji ltar 'di'i/ /rnam pa
272b7(mdo 'grel): gsal bar snang ba yin/ /dbang po'i yin na rdul phran rnams/ /rtag tu 'dzin pa med par 'gyur/ /de yi ngo bo snang ba yi/ /shes pa rtag tu ma skyes phyir/ /de bas de 'dzin sngar gyur pa'i/ /'khrul pa 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /ji ste tshad ma 
273a1(mdo 'grel): gzhan dag las/ /rdul phran grub par gyur na ni/ /de 'dzin snga mar gyur ba yis/ /rag pa'i rnam pa'i sems su 'gyur/ /gang phyir de nyid ma grub ste/ /tshad mas kyang ni rab tu btsal/ /rmi lam sogs na'ang 'phra med
273a2(mdo 'grel): par/ /rags par 'khrul bar snang ba yin/ /ring ba'i don la chung ngu yang/ /chen po nyid du nye bar dmigs/ /de bas de 'dzin las 'di men/ /ri mo brkyang ba mthong ba yi/ /rnam pa ji ste yang dag na/ /rnam par shes pa gcig pa yang//
273a3(mdo 'grel): de dang 'dra bar sna tshogs 'gyur/ /lus med phyir na rnam par shes/ /yul la bkram te skye mi srid/ /de phyir rnam shes du ma ru/ /rtog pa legs pa ma yin no/ /shes pa gcig dang tha mi dad/ /rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur ba med/ /tha dad gyur
273a4(mdo 'grel): na rnam pa dang/ /shes par 'brel pa med par gyur/ /rnam pa'ang ji ste rnam pa bcas/ /rtog par byed nas de med do/ /de ltar rnam par gzhan dang gzhan/ /sus kyang myong ba ma yin no/ /ji ste rnam pa med na ni/ /shes pa rnam bcas rtog don
273a5(mdo 'grel): med/ /tha dad tha dad med ma rtogs/ /phung po gzhan yang rigs pa min/ /'on te don gyi rnam snang ba/ /brdzun pa nyid du 'dod na yang/ /ji ltar brdzun pa 'di dag gis/ /gzhan gyi dngos po 'grub par 'gyur/ /ji ste brdzun pa mngon sum
273a6(mdo 'grel): du/ /gsal bar rab tu myong na ni/ /mngon sum pa yi dngos po yang/ /de tshe yang dag nyid ma yin/ /gzhan yang ji ste 'dra ba'i don/ /bdag nyid thams cad kyis yin na/ /don bzhin shes pa blun pa yi/ /ngo bor 'gyur ba gang gis
273a7(mdo 'grel): bzlog /rnal 'byor pa dag grol ba yang/ /gzhan gyi phyag sogs mthong ba na/ /de bzhin phyag sogs ldan par 'gyur/ /gnyi ga'ang cha shas med pa'i phyir/ /cha cig gis ni 'dra ba min/ /cha dang bcas pa ma grub na/ /yang dag
273b1(mdo 'grel): dngos po ci zhig 'grub/ /'on te bzlog pa'i bye brag gis/ /cha shas rtog par byed na yang/ /brtags pa yin phyir 'dra ba ni/ /gnas pa med pa nyid du 'gyur/ /thams cad du yang bdag rtogs pa'i/ /de yi rnam pa myong ba'i phyir/ /'dra ba yod kyang
273b2(mdo 'grel): phyi rol la/ /shes pas so sor myong ba med/ /mi 'dzin pa yi dus na ni/ /yul 'di yod pa ma yin no/ /mnyam pa'i dus na rgyu min phyir/ /rgyu ma yin dang yul yang min/ /gnas pa yin du zin na yang/ /rnam pa gnyis pa myong ba med/ /myong ba
273b3(mdo 'grel): yod par gyur na yang/ /de la brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs/ /'dra ba de myong gang yin pa/ /de nyid phyi rol myong ba yang/ /nye bar brtags pa yin pa'i phyir/ /de ni yang dag nyid ma yin/ /nye bar brtags pa tsam gyis ni/ /don byed 'dod pa'i
273b4(mdo 'grel): 'grub pa med/ /bram ze'i bu la me btags pas/ /'di ltar 'tshed la sbyor ba med/ /don ni yongs su ma mthong phyir/ /de dang 'dra bar 'grub pa med/ /byed rgyu yin na'ang 'bras bu la/ /'dra ba bskyed pa'i ma yin te/ /gzugs snang ba yi rnam
273b5(mdo 'grel): shes kyi/ /'on te sgra rig byung ba dang/ /sngon po la sogs snang ba na/ /mig la sogs pas ma nges 'gyur/ /rnam par dag las don 'grub pa/ /de ni rjes su dpag yin na/ /rmi lam la sogs 'khrul pa'i phyir/ /don gyis de la khyab pa'ang
273b6(mdo 'grel): med/ /gzhan du dbang po drug po dag /tshad ma so sor 'gog phyir dang/ /shin tu chung ba'i gzugs sogs kyis/ /sngon po la sogs ma grub phyir/ /mig gi rnam shes ldan pa yis/ /sngon po shes kyi sngon po'i ming/ /shes pa min
273b7(mdo 'grel): zhes gsungs pa gang/ /da ni tha snyad brten pa yin/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po rnams/ /yang dag min zhes ngas bshad pas/ /sems can rnams ni drang ba'i phyir/ /tha snyad du ni bstan pa yin/ /snang bas stong pa'i shes
274a1(mdo 'grel): pas kyang/ /gzhan rig pa ni rigs pa min/ /de ni khyad par med pa'i phyir/ /don ni nges pa med par 'gyur/ /gang phyir nye ba tsam dag gis/ /gzhan rig de ru 'gyur na ni/ /de ni kun la 'dra ba'i phyir/ /thams cad rig par tsam
274a2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /thams cad don kun mthong 'gyur te/ /'di ltar sna tshogs blo ldan gyis/ /yul du gzugs la sogs pa rnams/ /bye brag med phyir cis mi 'gyur/ /'on te yang ni yul 'ga' yis/ /blo dag shin tu bskyed byas nas/ /yod ces
274a3(mdo 'grel): khas len byed na ni/ /'dra ba slar yang 'ongs pa yin/ /rtogs pa'i ngo bo tha dad med/ /'dra ba dag las gzhan ci yod/ /shes pa gang yin rtogs yin na/ /de la'ang nyes pa gong du bstan/ /nges 'byung bye brag yod na yang/ /ma yin
274a4(mdo 'grel): dbang po'ang de dang 'dra/ /shes pa'i dus na 'di med na/ /rgyu las ji ltar rab tu myong/ /tshogs pa gcig la rag las nyid/ /ji ste bye brag rtogs byed na/ /sems dang sems byung tshogs pa yi/ /mig la sogs pa'ang de dang 'dra/ /
274a5(mdo 'grel): tshogs pa gcig la'ang rag las kyang/ /dbang po la sogs rtogs med de/ /yul ma yin phyir zhe na yang/ /de 'dir dpyod phyir mi rung ngo/ /yul nyid yin pa grub na ni/ /lan 'di rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /mtshan nyid 'khrul pa
274a6(mdo 'grel): yin pa'i phyir/ /de nyid ma grub brjod pa yin/ /rtogs bya dang ni yul gnyis la/ /bye brag 'ga' yang yod min te/ /bsgrub bya sgrub byed 'gog de gnyis/ /de phyir bye brag yod pa min/ /gang phyir yul min de bas na/ /'di ni
274a7(mdo 'grel): yul du mi 'gyur zhes/ /dngos po rnam par dag pa yi/ /smra ba shes pa gzhan su yod/ /gzhan du snang ba'i shes pa yi/ /'dzin par rigs pa ma yin te/ /de lta yin na yul gyi phyir/ /shes pa nges par mi 'gyur ro/ /sngo sogs
274b1(mdo 'grel): ngo bo snang ba yi/ /yul du sgra la sogs gyur te/ /thams cad kyis ni yul thams cad/ /rnam par shes par thal bar 'gyur/ /dngos su gzhan gyi ngo bo la/ /mngon sum so sor myong med na/ /de dang mtshan nyid mi mthun snang/ /de shes par ni ji
274b2(mdo 'grel): ltar 'gyur/ /yul gyi ched du dus kun tu/ /'dir yang phan pa mi byed de/ /mi snang ba dang gzhan du snang/ /phyogs gnyis snga ma bzhin du mtshungs/ /cung zad byed pa med na yang/ /'dzin par rtog pa rigs pa min/ /gzhan la dngos kyi
274b3(mdo 'grel): stong na ni/ /brjod pa 'thad pa ma yin no/ /des dben de yi rnam pa yi/ /mngon sum gnyis kyis rgyu 'bras kyi/ /dngos po rnam par nges pa 'di/ /de phyir yang dag nyid ma yin/ /'di ni 'di las 'byung ngo zhes/ /gnag rdzi yan chad ji ltar 'gyur//
274b4(mdo 'grel): grags yin na yang yin du zad/ /grags pa de dag gsal ba med/ /de 'dod rnams la skabs 'dir ni/ /yang dag ched du dpyad pa byed/ /ji ste grags pa 'gog byed na/ /rnam par dpyad pa rgyun chad 'gyur/ /gang dag grags pa'i dngos
274b5(mdo 'grel): po la/ /'gog par byed pa rab tu glen/ /de dag rnams kyis nges 'gal 'gyur/ /zla ba ri bong can 'gog bzhin/ /grags pa 'di ci bden pa 'am/ /bden pa min zhes nges bya phyir/ /gang phyir grags pa'i don nyid la/ /rab tu grags
274b6(mdo 'grel): pa tsam gyis ni/ /yang dag min zhes nye bar bsgrubs/ /brdzun pa'ang rmi lam la sogs na/ /'byung ba 'di dag yongs su nges/ /bden pa nyid ni log na yang/ /gang tshe de ni mi log pa/ /de tshe yang dag rnam dag pa/ /de yis 'gal bar ji
274b7(mdo 'grel): ltar 'gyur/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu mngon sum du/ /ji ste myong ba ma yin na/ /'di las 'di ni 'byung ngo zhes/ /ji ltar dran pa 'byung ba yin/ /rmi lam na yang brdzun pa yi/ /'bras bu la sogs dngos myong phyir/ /dran pa 'di ni de na snang/ /de las
275a1(mdo 'grel): dngos po rnam nges med/ /'on te dran pa'i rtags dag las/ /rjes su myong ba rnams nges pa/ /sbyir ni rab tu sgrub byed na/ /de tshe sgrub pa sgrub pa yin/ /'bras bu la sogs don dam pa'i/ /yul ni rjes su myong bar yang/ /ji ste
275a2(mdo 'grel): sgrub par byed 'dod na/ /rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir/ /de las de ni grub pa med/ /snang bcas la sogs rnam shes kyis/ /don la 'dzin pa des bzlog pa/ /khyed kyis byas pa ma yin nam/ /grogs kyis bstangs bas ngo bo 'phel/ /
275a3(mdo 'grel): rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni/ /rtag tu rnam shes bdag nyid nyid/ /bdag nyid rig pa'i ngo bo yi/ /mngon sum dag gis rnam par nges/ /yang dag ji bzhin du ma kun tu/ /de myong med phyir de ma rigs/ /khyed ni ji ltar myang ba der/ /
275a4(mdo 'grel): yang dag nyid duAng 'dod pa med/ /de ltar gzung dang 'dzin pa yi/ /rnam pa yod pa ma yin 'dod/ /rtag tu dngos po yod pa yi/ /shes pa de bzhin de myong mdo/ /de lta min na 'gro ba kun/ /rtag du de nyid mthong bar 'gyur/ /yang dag
275a5(mdo 'grel): goms bya ched du de/ /thar 'dod rkang smyang 'dug la rag /gcig la rnam pa gnyis 'gal phyir/ /ji ltar myong ba'i gzung ba dang/ /'dzin pa'i rnam snang de bzhin du/ /yang dag nyid ni ma yin no/ /gnas ngan len gyi bag chags las//
275a6(mdo 'grel): ji ste 'khrul pa'i rtags byung na/ /'khrul pa nyid du de snang ba/ 'di ni mngon sum grub pa med/ /'di ltar ma 'khrul mtshan nyid ni/ /mngon sum nyid du nye bar brjod/ /rtag tu bdag la 'khrul pa de/ /ji ltar mngon sum nyid du
275a7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /gsal bar gnas kyi ngo bor ni/ /de ni rang snang nyid yin phyir/ /rang gis ma 'khrul gang gyur ba/ /de las 'khrul pa tha dad med/ /ji ste 'khrul ba tha dad gyur/ /gnyis kyi ngo bo de gsal bar/ /de yang rang gi gnas
275b1(mdo 'grel): yin na/ /ji ltar de ni shes par bya/ /ji ste shes pa de ni yid/ /gnyis kyi rnam par rnam rtog pa/ /de la 'khrul pa 'byung na ni/ /gnyis su 'dzin pa gsal mi 'gyur/ /yid kyi 'khrul pa don gzhan du/ /'dra ba por nas 'gro ba med/ /gang
275b2(mdo 'grel): gis de ni 'khrul 'gyur ba/ /gnyis dang gnyis min mtshungs ci 'gyur/ /grang du 'ga' yis cung zad kyang/ /lan 'ga' mthong ba ma yin na/ /gzhan gyi 'dra ba mthong phyir te/ /de la 'khrul par ji ltar 'gyur/ /'on te thog ma
275b3(mdo 'grel): med ba yi/ /sa bon gnas ngan len smin las/ /'khrul na 'dra ba mthong med par/ /rang las skyes ba 'di nyid yin/ /de lta yin na'ang de yi tshe/ /'khrul ba don gzhan brtag mi rigs/ /shes pa thams cad rang nyid kyis/ /rang gi sa bon
275b4(mdo 'grel): dag las 'khrul/ /'khrul pa'i sa bon las byung ba/ /thams cad yin par khyed kyang 'dod/ /de phyir pha rol min mthong ba'i/ /shes kun 'di ltar rang las 'khrul/ /de phyir mngon sum nyid 'di yi/ /gnyis min yang dag grub pa med/ /de
275b5(mdo 'grel): ma grub na de yi phyir/ /rgyu 'bras de nyid 'grub pa med/ /ji ste gnyis ni 'khrul gyur kyang/ /rtag tu rtogs pa'i ngo bo de/ /ma 'khrul pa dag kho nar ni/ /mngon sum las grub ma yin nam/ /rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid na spyir/ /yul la nye bar rjod
275b6(mdo 'grel): byed pa/ /de ltar mngon sum yin gyur kyang/ /rang gi mtshan nyid spyod yul min/ /spyi yi mtshan nyid ma gtogs par/ /'di ltar rtogs pa'i ngo bo med/ /gang yang thun mong ma yin pa'i/ /ngo bo de ni gnyis su snang/ /rigs mi mthun pa
275b7(mdo 'grel): rnams gsal bas/ /khyad par kho na spyi nyid yin/ /de yang brdzun pa'i rang bzhin na/ /khyed kyi spyi yang ga la yod/ /dngos po rnams kyi yod pa nyid/ /bden yin gzhan ni brdzun zhes pa/ /rig byed mthar ni smra ba yi/ /grub mdza' gsal
276a1(mdo 'grel): bar brjod par gyur/ /gzhan du de dag shes pa can/ /spyi yi mtshan nyid skyes bur rig /rtag pa gcig yin bye brag rnams/ /de ni thams cad nor par ni/ /lta ba de dag ngan pa yin/ /thams cad bcings dang grol
276a2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur te/ /gcig ni bcings dang grol ba na/ /thams cad du yang cis mi 'gyur/ /'chi dang skye dang gnas pa dang/ /gnyid log sad dang glen la sogs/ /thams cad bye brag med pa'i phyir/ /cig car kho nar rab tu 'gyur/ /gzhan
276a3(mdo 'grel): yang rtogs pa'i ngo bo yi/ /mtshan nyid mkhas pas bstan pa ni/ /snang ba gzhan la mi bltos par/ /gang zhig rang nyid rtag tu snang/ /de ltar yin na gnyis snang ba/ /rang nyid rab tu gsal ba'i phyir/ /rtog pa'i ngo bos gzung ba
276a4(mdo 'grel): yi/ /bdag nyid rtag tu gnas pa yin/ /de ni rtag tu rdzun nyid kyi/ /rigs kyi khyim du 'jug pa 'di/ /khyad par med pa bdag nyid dag /nges par pang du blangs nas 'jug /ji ste rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /brdzun pa'i ngo bo nyid yin
276a5(mdo 'grel): na/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa gzhan de bzhin/ /de ni spong byed ma yin nam/ /ma spangs phyin ci log 'gyur zhing/ /spangs pas rnal 'byor can du 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor mngon sum rig bya ba/ /yang dag de yin mi rigs na/ /sangs rgyas
276a6(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi gnas pa yi/ /mya ngan 'das pa'ang mi 'grub cing/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yi/ /ye shes ring du spangs pa yin/ /de lta yin na thal sgo nas/ /ji ste de la bden zhe na spongs/ /sgrub na de bzhin 'dod pa'i phyir/ /
276a7(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa kho na rab tu bsgrubs/ /'on te dngos po thams cad du/ /med pa'i mtshan nyid de sgrub na/ /mi mthun phyogs las ma log phyir/ /gtan tshigs ma nges nyid du 'gyur/ /brdzun pa yin zhes thams cad du/ /gtang bar
276b1(mdo 'grel): 'os pa ma yin no/ /sgyu ma rnams ni brdzun nyid kyang/ /de byed pa rnams nye bar brten/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi don rnams la/ /nam yang mkho bar mi 'gyur gang/ /de dag thams cad yongs gtang zhing/ /spong ba nyid du rigs pa yin/ /bdag
276b2(mdo 'grel): gzhan don gyi rnam pa la/ /mkho ba'i yon tan gang yin pa/ /mkhas shing snying rje'i bdag nyid kyis/ /de dag ji ltar spong bar byed/ /de phyir ji srid gzhan don la/ /nye bar mkho bar 'gyur ba rnams/ /spangs kyang sangs rgyas rnam
276b3(mdo 'grel): dag ni/ /de dag thams cad bzlog pa med/ /thams cad sgyu ma byas 'dra zhes/ /brtun pa nyid du de dag shes/ /yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/ /des de phyin ci log pa med/ /dngos po nyid du blang ba dang/ /dngos po med pa ngor
276b4(mdo 'grel): ba yi/ rgyur ni nges pa ma yin te/ /'di la 'khrul pa de ltar snang/ /nyan thos pa la sogs pa dag /dngos por lta ba rnams kyis ni/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung gnyes par byed/ /'gog pa dngos po med pa'ang len/ /snying rjes khrid
276b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i rnal 'byor rnams/ /gzhan don bya ba'i ched du ni/ /glang po la sogs brdzun pa yang/ /sprul pa rab tu byed pa yin/ /de bzhin gzhan la phan par bzhed/ /thabs dang shes rab brten pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni phyin ci log
276b6(mdo 'grel): spangs kyang bzhugs bar bzhed pa yin/ /de bzhin brdzun pa'i ngo bo yang/ /rgyu med can 'byung gang na'ang med/ /sgyu ma la sogs brdzun yin yang/ /tshogs pa rnams las 'byung bar snang/ /sgyu ma la sogs 'khrul pa'i phyir//
276b7(mdo 'grel): rjes su 'gro ba'ang ma grub phyir/ /rgyu dang ldan pa yin zhes te/ /dngos po yod par 'gyur ba'ang med/ /gang zhig thog ma med pa nas/ /kun rdzob du yang gcig nas gcig /rgyu med gyur pa de dag ni/ /brdzun par yang ni 
277a1(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba med/ /de bas rang rgyu tshogs pa yi/ /sna tshogs rnam par 'brel pa las/ /sgyu ma ji ltar rab tu 'byung/ /rnal 'byor sgyu ma'ang de bzhin no/ /rnal 'byor ye shes dag gi rgyu/ /rang gi bsod nams ye shes tshogs tu/
277a2(mdo 'grel): mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa ni/ /blo ldan snying rje shes rab yin/ /'gro ba ma lus sgyu ma bzhin/ /gnas par shes rab dag gi rig /rmongs byed sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'dra/ /sngon gyi smon lam rnams kyi mthus/ /chu dang pad+ma 'dam gyis ltar/ /
277a3(mdo 'grel): srid pa'i skyon gyis yod mi gos/ /dpag med rmad byung bsam mi khyab/ /me lus yon tan pha rol phyin/ /ji srid 'khor ba 'di dag na/ /'gro ba ma lus don sgrub phyir/ /thub pa thugs rje chen po yis/ /gzhan la dag lus
277a4(mdo 'grel): bzhugs pa yin/ /de bas stong pa nyid brten pa/ /me la bya ba bzhin du gsungs/ /der ltung 'gyur ba dgag pa'i phyir/ /thad sa la'ang brten par bya ba yin/ /rnam pa ma lus thams cad dang/ /'gro ba gsum po dag la yang/ /
277a5(mdo 'grel): don dam kun rdzob ngo bo nyid/ /ji ltar snang bzhin mngom sum ste/ /'jig rten pa dag mngon sum ni/ /ji ltar snang bcas snang med shes/ /de bzhin nus pa bsam yas phyir/ /rig ste de bas thams cad mkhyen/ /yang dag don
277a6(mdo 'grel): bsgoms las byung ba'i/ /ye shes de ni rnam mi rtog /chos rnams snang med gang yin pa/ /des na yang dag ye shes brjod/ /des na bdag nyid chen po yi/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa grub/ /rnal 'byor kun shes yang dag
277a7(mdo 'grel): shes/ /rnam par bzhag pa 'gal ba med/ /rtogs pa'i ngo bo gang yin bden/ /gnyis kyi rnam par yang dag min/ /'dod pa de ni sngar bshad pa'i/ /skyon du rab tu 'gyur ba yin/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa pa rnams ni/ /'di ltar
277b1(mdo 'grel): gnyis snang tha dad med/ /shes pa'i ngo bo spong bar yang/ /de las gzhan bzhin cis mi byed/ /ji ste gnod pa med pa'i phyir/ /khyed cag de ni mi byed na/ /yang dag don dang dbyer med pas/ /gnyis po'ang bya bar mi 'gyur ro/ /chos la
277b2(mdo 'grel): bdag med bsgom pa rnams/ /don med 'gyur te gnyis las gzhan/ /kun brtags chos ni yod pa min/ /'on te gang zhig nyon mongs can/ /gnyis kyi ngo bo lung ma bstan/ /de dang rtogs pa'i ngo bo dag /bcas ste rnal 'byor pa
277b3(mdo 'grel): rnams spong/ /bden par sgro 'dogs spangs pa'i phyir/ /skyob ba rnams kyis yongs btang yang/ /rnam par dag na'ang gnyis snang ba/ /'gro la phan dang bde byed de/ /sngon gyi smon la lam shugs dag las/ /thugs rje goms
277b4(mdo 'grel): pa rnams kyis 'byung/ /gang phyir de ltar kho na yin/ /de bas rnal 'byor la sogs 'grub/ /rtag tu thub pa mi rtog par/ /yid bzhin nor bu bzhin bzhugs te/ /'gro ba ma lus phan mdzad par/ /gang dag smra ba de la yang/
277b5(mdo 'grel): gnyis po dag gi rnam pa las/ /rtog pa'i ngo bo dbyer med pa'i/ /rang gi ngo bo des spangs kyang/ /bzlog pa med pa kho na yin/ /'on kyang smon lam mthu rnams dang/ /tshogs kyi shugs kyis thub pa ni/ /'khrul pa ma lus rnam spangs na/ /dri
277b6(mdo 'grel): med bstan ba gnyis su med/ /ye shes dag pa 'byung ba de/ /rtag tu yid bzhin nor bu bzhin/ /bskal pa ji bzhin ma lus don/ /bya ba mdzad pa thams cad mkhyen/ /grub ces brjod pa de bas na/ /thams cad mkhyen sogs rnam par
277b7(mdo 'grel): gnas/ /de lta yin na thub pa yi/ /gnyis su snang ba brdzun yin yang/ /ji ste 'dod na byang chub kyang/ /dbyer med de bzhin 'dod par gyis/ /brdzun pa dag ni rab spangs kyang/ /thub pa'i thabs kyis mthu rnams las/ /'byung na de tshe byang
278a1(mdo 'grel): chub kyi/ /bden par mngon zhe na gang zhig yin/ /mi rtog ye shes gang yin pa/ /de yod pa ni sel mi byed/ /'on kyang yang dag dngos po nyid/ /de ni 'grub par nyid mi 'gyur/ /rnam par mi rtog ga las 'grub/ /
278a2(mdo 'grel): gnyis su rnam rtog spangs pa yis/ /rnam par mi rtog de 'dod na'ang/ /rang gi dngos la rnam rtog 'di/ /gang gis brtsal ba smra bar gyis/ /de la su ni mi phyung bar/ /rnam par rtog des spong pa med/ /dngos por 'dzin pa sangs rgyas kyis//
278a3(mdo 'grel): mdza' nyid du ni rab tu bstan/ /skyob pa'i ma 'dres chos rnams dang/ /de bzhin byams pa thugs rje sogs/ /gsungs pa gang yin de dag ni/ /mi rtog 'di yin bsgrub par dka' / /ji ste 'dul la de bzhin du/ /so sor snang zhes rnam rtog
278a4(mdo 'grel): na/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan kun/ /kun brtags nyid du thal bar 'gyur/ /gnas skabs kun tu rtag par yang/ /rtog bcas mi rtog pa yang rung/ /yod ye bsam par mi nus phyir/ /rnam pa kun nas thams cad rig /
278a5(mdo 'grel): de ni skal ba ji bzhin du/ /lus can kun gyi 'dod pa'i don/ /sgrub par byed ces 'chad na ni/ /thams cad 'gal ba med pa yin/ /rtogs pa'i ngo bo yang dag pa/ /de bas mngon sum grub pa med/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu de dag kyang/ /
278a6(mdo 'grel): de ma grub na de grub med/ /tha dad dus kyi bdag nyid gnyis/ /des ni so sor mi myong phyir/ /rang rig pa yi mngon sum las/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu rtogs pa med/ /bdag nyid gcig gi ngo bo'i phyir/ /gnyis kyi ngo bo nyid mi srid/ /de ni bltos
278a7(mdo 'grel): pas tha dad na'ang/ /kun brtags yin gyis yang dag min/ /bltos par bya ba tha dad phyir/ /rang rig pa yis 'dzin pa med/ /de ma bzung na de mi 'grub/ /bltos pa de yang kun brtags yin/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu 'dzin ba ni/ /so
278b1(mdo 'grel): sor rab tu rtogs pa las/ /rnam par rtog de mtshams sbyar nas/ /de gnyis gsal grub ma yin nam/ /de mi rigs te rnam rtog kyang/ /rang rig pa yi mthar thug pas/ /gzhan dngos lan 'ga' dam mthong na/ /de na ji ltar mtshams sbyor byed/ /
278b2(mdo 'grel): sems can dag ni thams cad kyang/ /rang gi ngo bo rtogs phyir dang/ /dran pa'ang bdag nyid mthar thug phyir/ /de la dran pa'ang mi 'grub po/ /gzhan du 'dzin pa'i don dag ni/ /gzhan du sbyar bar mi rigs so/ /rgyud can dag la ma gtogs
278b3(mdo 'grel): par/ /rgyud ni ma brtags yod pa min/ /gzhan gyis 'bras bu tsam la 'dzin/ /de bzhin rgyu tsam gzhan gyis 'dzin/ /gnyi ga gcig char myong med na/ /lod bas gnyis sbyor byed dam ci/ /ci tsam 'bras bu mi snang zhing/ /rgyu yang 'ga' 
278b4(mdo 'grel): yis ma yin pa/ /de srid bdag ni 'bras bu las/ /sogs pa'i ngo bo des myong med/ /chu sogs rnam pa'i rnam par shes/ /'das ma thag du me sogs kyis/ /rnam par 'byung ba shes pa dang/ /du ba'i shes las me blo mthong/ /de
278b5(mdo 'grel): phyir me las du ba dang/ /sa bon nyid las myu gu zhes/ /bya ba la sogs rgyu 'bras kyi/ /nges pa 'grub pa med par 'gyur/ /gzhan las kyang ni du ba dag /'byung phyir du ba mthong ba las/ /mer snang ba yi rnam par shes/ /rjes su dpag ba'ang
278b6(mdo 'grel): mi 'grub po/ /med dang du pa'i blo gnyis dag /'dra bar 'byung bar nges yod na/ /du ba kho na rtags yin gyi/ /me ma yin de ci yi phyir/ /ji ltar du ba'i blo dag gis/ /bag chags gsal bar sad byas te/ /me blo rtogs byed de bzhin du/
278b7(mdo 'grel): me blo'ang de la ji ste min/ /de ltar kun las shes pa kun/ /'byung ba dag ni mthod ba'i phyir/ /kun gyi rtags su kun gyur pas/ /kye ma'o go byed gnas pa yin/ /de bas de zhig mngon sum las/ /rgyu 'bras rtogs pa yang dag pa/ /yod
279a1(mdo 'grel): pa ma yin des na 'di/ /mngon sum gnyis ni nges pa med/ /de gnyis dang ni rtags 'gyur yang/ /'brel ba rab tu ma grub phyir/ /rjes su dpag pa dag las kyang/ /rgyu 'bras dngos po grub pa med/ /rtags dang 'brel
279a2(mdo 'grel): par nges pa ni/ /mngon sum nyid du grub pa med de/ /de gnyis lkog du gyur pa'i phyir/ /sdar na ji ltar bshad pa bzhin/ /gnas pa med par 'di thal phyir/ /rjes su dpag pas kyang mi rigs/ /'brel pa nges pa med pa yi/ /rtags las de
279a3(mdo 'grel): dngos nges pa'ang med/ /rtags kyang mngon sum nyid du ni/ /grub pa ma yin de dngos bzhin/ /rjes su dpag pas mi 'grub ste/ /de bzhin 'dir yang gnas pa med/ /ji ste rgyu 'bras dngos po yi/ /yod pa sgrub par byed na ni/ /de tshe gtan
279a4(mdo 'grel): tshigs thams cad dag /nyes pa gsum las ldog pa med/ /'di ltar yod pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /dngos po rnams kyi chos kyis sam/ /dngos pa med dang gnyi ga'i 'am/ /gnyis min chos kyi gtan tshigs grang/ /dngos ma grub
279a5(mdo 'grel): na de la brten/ /dngos po'i chos ni grub pa med/ /de las bzlog pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /med pa'i chos ni 'gal bar 'gyur/ /gnyi ga'i chos ni ma nges te/ /gnyen po la yang yod pa'i phyir/ /gnyis min chos kyi ngo bo dag /yid kyis
279a6(mdo 'grel): kyang ni rig pa med/ /'on te yod pa mi sgrub kyi/ /de gnyis 'brel pa can sgrub ni/ /sgrub pa de yang rigs pa yin/ /de lta min na gtan tshigs kun/ /gzhi ma grub par thal bar 'gyur/ /rang gi ngo bo de gnyis kyang/ /grub pa med par sngar
279a7(mdo 'grel): bstan zin/ /gzhan yang 'bras de grub bya phyir/ /rgyu la nus pa yod pa min/ /de grub na ni 'grub 'gyur na/ /grub na rgyu des ci zhig bya/ /de bas gcig la gcig brten nas/ /de gnyis grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /bdag nyid
279b1(mdo 'grel): rab tu ma grub par/ /gzhan gyi skyabs su 'gyur ba med/ /du ba las ni me shes te/ /chu skyar las ni chur shes zhes/ /bya ba la sogs 'bras bu gang/ /gsungs pa de ni tha snyad brten/ /yang dag du yang dus la sogs/ /mdo sde gzhan las
279b2(mdo 'grel): bkag phyir dang/ /yang dag nyid kyi dngos de ni/ /rigs pas kyang ni mi 'grub po/ /de grub bya phyir rang bzhin gyi/ /gtan tshigs kyang ni brtag med de/ /gzhi ni rab tu ma grub pas/ /rang nyid de ni ma grub phyir/ /gzhi yod na yang grub bya
279b3(mdo 'grel): phyir/ /spyi ru rab tu sgrub byed pa/ /tha snyad du ni 'dod pa'i phyir/ /'di ltar grub pa sgrub pa yin/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po 'di/ /yang dag nyid du grub bya'i phyir/ /gtan tshigs 'di yi rjes 'gro ba/ /ma grub brgal zhing brtag
279b4(mdo 'grel): pa mtshungs/ /skye ba'i chos can gang yin pa/ /de kun 'jig pa'i chos can zhes/ /bya ba la sogs skye 'jig nyid/ /mdo sde las ni gsungs pa gang/ /de ni gang zag bdag med tsam/ /yang dag nyid la 'jug bya phyir/ /nyan thos
279b5(mdo 'grel): pa yi dbang du gsungs/ /zab mo'i gtam la brten pa min/ /chos rnams kun gyi yang dag nyid/ /skye dang 'jig pa'i chos nyid du/ /rjes su mthong ba de dag gi /shes rab gzugs brnyan yin par gsungs/ /de yod na ni yod yin zhes/
279b6(mdo 'grel): de grub bya phyir brjod pa yang/ /bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa gnyis/ /de la bye brag mngon pa med/ /'on te rab tu rmongs rnams kyis/ /tha snyad rung bar bya ba de/ /bsgrub par bya ba de bas ni/ /dam bcas phyogs cig 'gyur ba med/ /rgyu dang
279b7(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu'i chos can la/ /yang dag mngon sum grub na ni/ /tha snyad de ni sgrub la rag /de yang ma grub sngar bstan zin/ /de yi tha snyad tsam dag ni/ /bsgrubs su zin kyang yang dag pa'i/ /dngos po mi 'grub de yis 'dir/ /khyab pa gang dus
280a1(mdo 'grel): ma grub po/ /gzhan yang de yi dus na ni/ /'gro ba ma lus yod na yang/ /'bras bu yod pa yin pa'i phyir/ /de yi 'bras bur sgrub pa la/ /ma nges pa yi gtan tshigs 'gyur/ /ji ltar de yod na ni mthong/ /
280a2(mdo 'grel): de med gyur na ma mthong ba/ /de bzhin mtshungs pa'i dus rnams kyi/ /yod dang med pa'ang de dang mtshungs/ /de ni grub par bya ba'i phyir/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu rgyun rnams la/ /brten te rjes 'gro ldog pa nyid/ /des pa brjod pa
280a3(mdo 'grel): ma yin nam/ /skad cig pa ni ma gtogs par/ /gang yang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid/ /gang duAng sman pa kha cig gis/ /nam yang gzung bar nus pa med/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yi/ /yang dag pa ni dpyad pa yi/ /skabs
280a4(mdo 'grel): 'di yin skad cig las/ /gzhan du rgyun ni yang dag med/ /skad cig pa nyid 'bras bu dang/ /rgyu yang yang dag yin grang na/ /de ma grub na rgyu 'bras kyi/ /yang dag nyid ni ji ltar 'grub/ /'on te yang ni rgyun gcig par/
280a5(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba rnams la de sgrub kyi/ /skad cig rgyu ni tha dad par/ /'byung ba rnams la ma yin na/ /tha snyad de yang mthong nas ni/ /de tshe de ni sgrub la rag /rgyu dang 'bras bur rtogs pa yi/ /dngos po zhig na gang du bsgrub/ /ji
280a6(mdo 'grel): ste de dang 'dre ba yi/ /gzhan gyi dngos la sgrub byed na/ /shin tu thal bar 'gyur ba ste/ /yang dag dngos de 'grub pa med/ /mi dmigs pa yi gtan tshigs kyis/ /dngos po de ni nges med de/ /gang phyir de yis yod
280a7(mdo 'grel): mi sgrub/ /'gog pa kho na sgrub par byed/ /mngon sum nyid dang mi dmigs pas/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu sgrub byed ces/ /gar smras 'dir ni mngon sum las/ /ma gtogs mi dmigs yod pa min/ /slob dpon rnams kyi
280b1(mdo 'grel): sgrub pa de/ /tha snyad du ni gsungs pa dag /de ni sgrub byed kho na zhes/ /rgyas par rab tu bsnan pa yin/ /mthong ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa dag /ma mthong ba las gang yod na/ /gang du snang de rjes 'gro las/ /gang de 'bras bu yin no zhes/ /rgyu dang
280b2(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu nyid bsgrub par/ /rjod pa de la the tshom ni/ /ldog pa ma de gzhan dag gi /rgyu las yin par dogs pa'i phyir/ /de na de yod pas sam ci/ /'on te rgyang ring gzhan gyis sam/ /mi snang 'dre la sogs pas sam/ /zhes ni the tsom
280b3(mdo 'grel): 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zla ba la sogs ring gnas pa/ /rgyur ni khas mi len pa'ang med/ /'dre la sogs pa 'babs la sogs/ /byed pa dag kyang med dam ci/ /ma mthong tsam las 'di dag gi /snga nas yod pa nyid 'gog gi /gzhan dag
280b4(mdo 'grel): rgyu nyid yin grub ba/ /de la gang gis bzlog par byed/ /de na yod na gang yod par/ /'gyur ba nyid ni de dag kyang/ /'dod rgyas bar yang srid par ni/ /dogs pha de bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'dod rgyas nyid ni mi bslu ba/ /gang gis skad
280b5(mdo 'grel): cig mang po las/ /log te rtag par nges pa dang/ /cung zad yod pa ma yin no/ /lan cig mthong ba'i don rnams kyang/ gzhan du snang ba ma yin te/ /gzhan du mthong la gzhan dag la/ /brtags par rigs pa ma yin no/ /gzhan dag
280b6(mdo 'grel): yod las gang phyir phyir/ /gang mi 'byung ba de dag ni/ /de ni 'bras bu yin zhes smras/ /ldog pa'i sgo nas 'bras bu de/ /sgrub pa gang yin de la yang/ /gzhan dag med par 'gyur bas na/ /de ma byung zhes dogs pa'i phyir/ /the tshom
280b7(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gnas pa yin/ /gzhan dag nus pa yod pa yi/ /rgyu ni sa bye brag yod pa'i phyir/ /de ni gzhan dag log par ni/ /dogs pa med ces 'dod na yang/ /de ni mi rigs rgyu de nyid/ /bye brag yod par ga las grub/ /gzhan gyis
281a1(mdo 'grel): yang ni rgyu yi zhes/ /'di ni brjod par yang byed cing/ /de dag log nyid ce na yang/ /de tshe de ni gnas pa med/ /des na ma nges pa yi phyir/ /bye brag grub pa ma yin no/ /rgyu 'bras ci zhes the tshom za/ /ma grub ces te grub
281a2(mdo 'grel): bya phyir/ /de dag nyid la kun rten nas/ /grub par rtog pa ngo mtshar che/ /de ltar rjes su dpag pas kyang/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu grub pa med/ /skye ba rmi lam skye bzhin zhes/ /de yi phyir na mkhas pas brjod/ /rtag pa'i ngo bo bdag nyid kyang/ /mngon
281a3(mdo 'grel): sum nyid du rtog pa med/ /bdag sogs shes pa gang du yang/ /tha snyad du yang myong med phyir/ /de ni rtag tu ma bral la/ /de yod tsam las shes pa 'byung/ /de rtog rnams kyi dus rtag du/ /de yi bdag nyid bzhin yod 'gyur/ /
281a4(mdo 'grel): phan pa dag ni mi byed na/ /yul du brtag par mi rigs te/ /de rtog byed na'ang nyes pa 'dir/ /snga ma bzhin du ldog pa med/ /de yi rnam shes rjes 'brang na/ /de dang 'brel phyir de bdag bzhin/ /shes pa de yang rtag yod 'gyur/ /yul
281a5(mdo 'grel): nyid la ni shes pa de/ /ji ste rtag tu mi 'brang ste/ /de lta min na de shes pa'i/ /shes bya'i ngo bor 'gyur ba med/ /de yod sgrub la snga ma bzhin/ /gtan tshigs kun ni thams cad du/ /nyes pa gsum gyi skyon chags phyir/ /rjes su dpag
281a6(mdo 'grel): pas kyang mi 'grub/ /rim 'am cig car 'jug pa yi/ /skyed pa nyid ni mi srid na/ /des na rtag pa'i 'bras bu las/ /'di yod nges pa ma yin no/ /rjes su 'gro dang ldog nyid kyis/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu 'grub yin na/ /de na ma bral yod na yang/ /
281a7(mdo 'grel): lan 'ga' rtag tu med pa'i phyir/ /bdag la sogs pa gang du yang/ /'bras bu bde sogs rjes 'gro med/ /bde ba la sogs log pa yang/ /rtag pa rnams la mi srid do/ /mi shes rmongs pas brtags pa yis/ /bde la sogs pas
281b1(mdo 'grel): de sgrub tu/ /de bas 'bras bu ma grub phyir/ /'bras bu dag las de nges med/ /chos can dag ni ma grub na/ /rang bzhin gtan tshigs 'dir mi srid/ /yod pa nyid bsgrub bya yin phyir/ /mi dmigs pa yang rung ba min/ /de ltar yang ni dngos po ni/ /
281b2(mdo 'grel): tshad ma dag las grub pa med/ /tshad ma gnyis las ma gtogs pa'i/ /tshad ma gzhan yang yod pa min/ /don ni grub par bya ba'i phyir/ /phyi rol gtan tshigs yod min nam/ /'di ltar tha mal mig la sogs/ /sngon po la sogs snang ba
281b3(mdo 'grel): gang/ /de ni rgyu gzhan 'dra ba las/ /skyes so zhes ni rtog par byed/ /shes pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bo'i phyir/ /shes pa bzhin du bslu ba med/ /skye ba yang dag sgrub pa'i phyir/ /'dir ni dpe 'grub med pa yin/ /kun rdzob tu yang ma 'brel phyir/ /ma
281b4(mdo 'grel): nges pa yi gtan tshigs 'gyur/ /rgyu yis rang dang 'dra ba dag /'bras bu la skyed des med de/ /shing sogs mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i/ /me tog la sogs sna tshogs srid/ /rgyu gzhan gyis ni tsam bsgrubs kyang/ /phyi rol don ni mi 'grub  
281b5(mdo 'grel): ste/ /khyad par du ni de dag gi /rjes 'gro gang duAng ma grub po/ /rtogs pa'i ngo bo las gzhan pa/ /gzung ba'i rnam pa sngo la sogs/ /yang dag med pas bsgrub bya dang/ /dpe yi chos can tha dad med/ /mi bslu bar yang phyi rol
281b6(mdo 'grel): don/ /phrad pa ji ste 'dod na ni/ /de tshe nyid sgrub bya yin phyir/ /de tshe gtan tshigs ma grub nyid/ /don byed pa dag snang tsam gyis/ /ngo bo ji ste 'dod na ni/ /rmi lam dag na don med kyang/ /de bzhin mthong phyir ma nges 'gyur/ /ldog pa las
281b7(mdo 'grel): kyang phyi rol don/ /'grub par rigs pa ma yin te/ /rjes su 'gro ba med par yang/ /ldog pa nam yang 'grub pa med/ /nus pa bral ma thag tu yang/ /ldog pa nyid du rab 'gyur ba/ /gang duAng shes pa don rtogs pa'i/ /rjes su 'gro ba
282a1(mdo 'grel): 'grub pa med/ /gzhan dag nus pa yod na ni/ /shes pa lag pa med pa nyid/ /grub dang ma grub the tshom phyir/ /'on kyang don ni grub pa med/ /bdag ni shes 'di ma skyes pa/ /de ma thag dang bral bas sam /'on
282a2(mdo 'grel): te don dang bral ba zhes/ /the tshom dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rgyu ldan gzhal bya nyid sogs kyis/ /phyi rol don sgrub skyon chags par/ /mu stegs rnams kyis smras pa gang/ /de ni tshul 'dis rig par gyis/ /de ltar phyi rol don
282a3(mdo 'grel): dag ni/ /rjes su dpag las grub pa med/ /shes pa smra pa'i shes pa yang/ /yang dag pa ni yod pa min/ /shes pa gnyis su med pa de/ /rtag tu dbang po las 'das phyir/ /rtags kyi 'di ni rnam nges pa'i/ /'brel pa yang ni yod pa min/ /gnyis
282a4(mdo 'grel): su med pa'i chos can la/ /rang bzhin nyid ni bsgrub bya'i phyir/ /'di ltar rang bzhin zhes bya'i rtags/ /'di sgrub pa la yod pa min/ /gnyis su med pa'i shes pa la/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu ma grub phyir/ /des na 'bras bu zhes bya ba'i/ /rtags ni
282a5(mdo 'grel): gang yang sred pa med/ /gnyis su med la ma gtogs par/ /'bras bur khyed 'dod cung zad med/ /de nyid sgrub par byed pa'i phyir/ /khyed kyi de yang ma grub po/ /gnyis de grub pa gang yin pa'ang/ /'bras bu yang dag nyid med de/ /de ni rtag tu
282a6(mdo 'grel): ma skyes phyir/ /rta yi rwa la sogs pa bzhin/ /'gog pa'i yul can nyid du ni/ /de ni mkhas pas brjod pa'i phyir/ /de yod sgrub par byed pa la/ /mi dmigs pa yang rigs pa min/ /dga' dang gdung pa'i rang bzhin sogs/ /de ni gsal
282a7(mdo 'grel): bar ngas bzung phyir/ /rnam shes mtshan nyid chos can ni/ /byis pa yan chad grub min nam/ /de la'ang gnyis kyi ngo bo ni/ /'gal phyir de ni dben par du/ /bsgrub bya grang ba'i ngo bo yi/ /dro ba ji ltar dben pa bzhin/ /gang yang gang
282b1(mdo 'grel): gi ngo bo gsal/ /gzung pa dang ni 'dzin pa yang/ /gcig dang du ma bral phyir dang/ /de med par yang de med phyir/ /de phyir shes pa gnyis med grub/ /khyed cag gnyis po dben ba tsam/ /ji ste sgrub par 'dod na ni/ /de ni grub ba sgrub yin te/  
282b2(mdo 'grel): gang phyir bden pa nyid mi 'dod/ /yin pas sgo nas shes pa la/ /gnyis kyi rnam pa dben pa nyid/ /sgrub na 'dir yang 'dod pa dang/ /mi 'gal phyir na grub pa sgrub/ /don dam nyid du ma skyes pa'i/ /rnam shes bdag nyid chos can la/ /gnyis
282b3(mdo 'grel): kyi rnam pa dben pa nyid/ /'dod na yang dag gang zhig yin/ /ji ste gnyis med ngo bo dang/ /dngos po nyid duAng rtogs byed cing/ /shes pa gnyi ga sgrub 'dod na/ /de ltar rjes 'gro 'dir mi grub/ /dpe ni bsgrub byas stong pa ste/ /kun tu
282b4(mdo 'grel): brtags pa brjod pa'i phyir/ /yang dag pa yi dngos po nyid/ /dro ba'i reg pa grub pa med/ /phyi rol don gyi ngo bo ru/ /dro ba'i reg pa 'dod na yang/ /de ni gnyi gar ma grub ces/ /brtag pa ci ga ma byas sam/ /grang dra'i rig gnyis rnam
282b5(mdo 'grel): shes kyi/ /rnam pa'i ngo bor 'dod na ni/ /shes pa gcig la'ang snang pa'i phyir/ /yang dag nyid du 'gal ba med/ /sgrub par byed pas stong pa yi/ /dpe 'di yin pa de yi mngon/ /ma brtags pa yi ngo bo la/ dper byed na'ang 'dod grub
282b6(mdo 'grel): med/ /'on te'ang gnyis kyi ngo bo nyid/ /bral bar bsgrub pa'i don gyis na/ /shes pa'i dngos po nyid kyang ni/ /rab tu grub ces sems na ni/ /'brel pa rab tu ma grub pas/ /de mi rigs te dngos po yis/ /gnyis kyi rnam pa dben pa la/
282b7(mdo 'grel): khyab? pa gang duAng ma grub po/ /gang dang gang na gnyis med pa/ /de dang de na dngos yod par/ /'di la 'brel pa bya ba'i phyir/ /mi mthun phyogs sel tshad ma med/ /nam mkha' i me tog la sogs dang/ /gnyis de nyid kyi ma des 'gyur//
283a1(mdo 'grel): gnas pa med par thal ba'i phyir/ /gnyis la gzhan gnyis yod pa min /gnyis dang gnyis med ngo bo dag /ji ste 'gal ba yod na ni/ /gcig tu gnas par mi 'gyur te/ /grang dang dro ba de gnyis bzhin/ /'on te ma
283a2(mdo 'grel): rig dbang gis na /de la gnyis ni brdzun pa snang/ /des na 'gal ba med yin te/ /dngos po nyid la de bzhag phyir/ /ji ste 'gal ba med nyid na/ /ji ste der ni 'dir la gnod/ /'gal ba med pa can dag la/ /drol grang bzhin gnod ma
283a3(mdo 'grel): srid/ /bden dang bden min ngo bo dag /ji ltar 'gal ba nyid mi 'gyur/ /brdzun pa nyid du ji ltar snang/ /brdzun pa'i ngo bo snang yin na/ /shes pa yang ni brdzun par 'gyur/ /de lta min na 'gal ba de/ /snang ba'i ngo bor ji ltar 'gyur/ /
283a4(mdo 'grel): brdzun pa yin na'ang gang du gnyis/ /gnod par 'gyur ba'i chos can du/ /spyi yi mtshan nyid grub pa med/ /des na gtan tshigs ma grub nyid/ /gnyis kyi rnam shes kho na ni/ /de nyid rang nyid gsal ba'i phyir/ /gnyis su snang ba ma gtogs
283a5(mdo 'grel): par/ /chos can nyid ni yod pa min/ /gcig dang du ma dben pa'i phyir/ /gzung ba ji ltar stong pa nyid/ /shes pa'ang de las dbyer med pa /de bzhin stong pa nyid du gnod/ /ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa yang/ /ji ltar rnam par snang bar
283a6(mdo 'grel): ni/ /'gal ba med pa de bzhin gzhan/ /shes pa la sogs ji zhig 'gal/ /rnam par shes la gnyis yod pa/ /cha shes gnyis ni mi rigs phyir/ /mdo sde pa la sogs pa yis/ /yang dag nyid du 'dod pa med/ /gnyis su
283a7(mdo 'grel): med pa'i rnam shes la/ /phyi rol don yang mi 'gal phyir/ /des na gnyis med ngo bo nyid/ /sgrub na ci zhig bsgrubs par 'gyur/ /ji ste tshad ma gzhan dag gis/ /phyi rol gnod par brjod na ni/ /rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin
283b1(mdo 'grel): du/ /rab tu gnod par ci mi 'dod/ /gcig dang du ma bral ba'i phyir/ /don ni sna tshogs ngo bo dag /ji ltar yang dag mi rigs pa/ /de bzhin rnam shes kyang 'dod kyis/ /de bas tshad mas grub pa yis/ /don dam dngos po yod pa
283b2(mdo 'grel): min/ /des na rtog dang ldan rnams kyis/ /yod pa'i tha snyad 'dir mi rigs/ /gnod par byed pa'ang yod pa'i phyir/ /'di la kun tu the tshom yod/ /dngos por med pa smra bar yang/ /tshad ma med par mi rigs so/ /'di ltar dngos
283b3(mdo 'grel): po kun dben pa /mngon sum dag gis rtogs pa med/ /de yi stobs kyis 'byung ba'i phyir /don de dngos po nyid la yin/ /gzhan yang gzhan gyis dben pa yi/ /phyogs la sogs pa 'dzin na ni/ /de las gzhan pas dben pa nyid/ /mngon
283b4(mdo 'grel): sum dag gis rtogs pa yin/ /dngos po gang zhig rnam brtags na/ /dngos po kun gyi dben pa nyid/ /mngon sum nyid du rtogs 'gyur ba /dngos po med par smra ba la'ang/ /thams cad nang du de 'dus phyir/ /chos rnams kun gyi dngos
283b5(mdo 'grel): po yis /dben pa ci yang yod pa min/ /de lta ma yin dam bcas nyams /thams cad dngos po med yin na/ /bsgrub bya dpe yi chos can dang/ /gtan tshigs la sogs ma grub phyir/ /rjes su dpag pas rig pa med/ /gzhan
283b6(mdo 'grel): yang rang bzhin 'bras bu yi/ /gtan tshigs gnyis kyis de mi sgrub/ de gnyis dngos po nyid sgrub ste/ /dngos po med par 'gal ba nyid/ /ma skyes ngo bo'i chos yin na/ /de yi gtan tshigs gang 'gyur ba /'bras bu dang ni rang bzhin
283b7(mdo 'grel): dag /gang yang yod pa ma yin no/ /yul dang dus sogs bye brag gis/ /sngo dang bde sogs ngo bo bzhin dngos po rnams ni dmigs pa'i phyir/ /mi dmigs pa yang grub pa med/ /gzhan yang gzhan gyis dben pa'i don/ /mngon
284a1(mdo 'grel): sum rtogs pa yod na ni/ /de la gzhan don dben pa yi/ /tha snyad bsgrub pa rab tu byed/ /rang bzhin mi dmigs pa dag gis/ /thams cad dben par mi 'gyur te/ /des na bdag nyid mi dmigs pas/ /re zhig de ni sgrub mi
284a2(mdo 'grel): byed/ /khyab bya khyad par byed pa yi/ /dngos po la sogs grub yin na/ /khyab bya la sogs dgag pa la/ /khyab byed mi dmigs la sogs sbyor/ /chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin ni/ /khyab par bya la sogs grub par/ /'ga' dang lhan cig
284a3(mdo 'grel): ci ste nges/ /de tshe dngos por bcas pa yin/ /chos rnams ma lus dngos med par/ /sgrub na dpe ni yod pa min/ /nyi tshe ba dag rab bsgrub na/ /mi 'dod par ni 'gyur ba med/ /dngos po med pa bsgrub pa la/ /dngos po'i chos kyi gtan tshigs
284a4(mdo 'grel): 'gal/ /med pa'i chos kyang 'brel pa med/ /gnyis la brten pa 'khrul par 'gyur/ /chos rnams thams cad bdag med pa/ /skyes bu kun gyi mngon sum gyis/ /rtogs pa med ces bya ba 'dir/ /khyod la mtshan ma ci zhig yod/ /de ni
284a5(mdo 'grel): dgag par bya ba la/ /rang gi dmigs pa log pa yang/ /ma nges phyir na thams cad kyi/ /dmigs pa log par nges pa med/ /rab rib can bzhin gzugs la sogs/ /brdzun pa rnams ni mthong ba'i phyir/ /yang dag pa yi dngos po'i
284a6(mdo 'grel): don/ /mngon sum 'ga' yang grub pa med/ /yang dag don bsgoms rab mdza' las/ /byung ba'i ye shes yang dag pa'i/ /don gyi yul can yin 'dod kyi/ /dmigs pa'i stobs kyis byung ba min/ /de dag kho na don dam pa/ /mthong
284a7(mdo 'grel): pa gang yin mthong med yin/ /'gro ba'i chos rnams shes rab kyi/ /thams cad ji bzhin mthong ba min/ /chos kun snang med gang yin de/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i 'das pa yi/ /ye shes de nyid chos rnams la/ /mthong ba med par nye bar
284b1(mdo 'grel): brjod/ /chos rnams ma lus ji bzhin du/ /bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis byung ba'i phyir/ /dngos po med pa ma yin yang/ /de ni 'khrul pa gang yang med/ /rnal 'byor de yi rtogs de ni/ /so sor rang rig bsam mi khyab/ /de ni kun tu gsal bya bar/ /nus
284b2(mdo 'grel): pa dag la yod pa min/ /'khrul pa gang yin 'khrul nyid du/ /ji lta ba bzhin du de kun rtogs/ /de yang des na 'di dag la/ /ma 'khrul pa yis brjod pa yin/ /yang dag pa las ldog med do/ /dngos rnams yang dag med yin yang//
284b3(mdo 'grel): rang gi tshogs las rnal 'byor pa'i/ /zhes pa gyur zhes sngar bsgrubs zin/ /dngos po med par smra ba yis/ /sgyu ma dang ni rmi lam mtshungs/ /dngos po rnams la rjod byed kyi/ /ri bong rwa dang 'dra bar min/ /las dang nyon mongs dbang
284b4(mdo 'grel): gis na/ /de ltar srid pa'i 'khor lo 'byung/ /rang gi tshogs las rnal 'byor pa'i/ /shes pa'i 'khor lo de bzhin 'byung/ /de ni ste'u dang tsan dan mnyam/ /shes rab thugs rje dri ma med/ /chos kun phyin ci ma log par /mkhas pa
284b5(mdo 'grel): rnams ni bzhugs pa yin/ /de dag kho nas yang dag pa/ /mngon sum rtogs kyis gzhan dag ni/ /lung dang rigs pa'i rjes 'brangs nas/ /rigs pa'i lam la mkhas ba yin/ /kha cig du ni dngos po 'ga' / /don gzhan gyis ni
284b6(mdo 'grel): dben pa dag /'dzin pa yod na stong pa nyid/ /mngon sum rtogs pa gang yin pa/ /dngos po rnams kyi gcig la gcig /stong pa nyid de yod par 'dod/ /chos rnams de yis stong pa can/ /mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ /rang dang spyi
284b7(mdo 'grel): yi mtshan nyid du/ /ji ltar bzhag pa de dag ni/ /yang dag yod pa ma yin pas/ /des na chos kun dngos med 'dod/ /gcig la gcig gi stong pa nyid/ /brtags pa yin gyi yang dag min/ sgyu ma la sogs mtshungs pa la/ /gzhan
285a1(mdo 'grel): gyis dben pa yang dag med/ rmi lam bzhin du dngos po kun/ /phan tshun dben pa bzhin du snang/ /de yi dbang gis 'di dag gi /gcig la gcig gi stong pa nyid/ /brtags yin de'i phyir rang byung gis/ /tha chad
285a2(mdo 'grel): spang ba kho nar gsung/ /de bas de la brtan nas ni/ /sun 'byin pa ni rigs pa min/ /mtshan nyid stong nyid gang yin pa/ /de ni chos la brtags pa min/ /rnal 'byor pa ye shes pa yis/ /de yang ji ltar bstan bzhin rtogs/ /goms
285a3(mdo 'grel): par byas na brdzun pa yang/ /shin tu gsal bar snang ba yin/ /de bas yang dag bsgom byas na/ /rnam par gsal ba'i ye shes 'byung/ /gsal zhing mi bslu la sogs pa'i/ /rnal 'byor ye shes gang yin pa/ /de ni mngon sum mtshan
285a4(mdo 'grel): nyid grub/ /der gyur de phyir tshad ma yin/ /tshad ma ldan pa'i yul nyid kyis/ /mi bslu la sogs phyi nas 'chad/ /des na blo dang ldan pa yi/ /rnal 'byor shes pa spang mi rigs/ /ji ste yang dag nyid brten nas/ /chos can la sogs
285a5(mdo 'grel): ma grub par/ /gleng bar byed na de yi tshe/ /mi 'dod gyur pa med bstan zin/ /de ltar don dam nyid du na/ /khyod kyi sun 'byin pa dag kyang/ /gnas thod pa ni der med de/ /mkha' la dbyu gus rdeg pa bzhin/ de lta yin yang tha snyad du/ /
285a6(mdo 'grel): sun 'byin la sogs rab grub phyir/ /khyed kyi sun 'byin smras pa dang/ /de bzhin nges kyi tshad ma sogs/ /mkhas pas ji ltar bstan pa bzhin/ /tha snyad kho nar de dag bstan/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rig pa dag /med kyang ji ltar
285a7(mdo 'grel): snang 'di la/ /dpag par bya dang dpog pa yi/ /'bras bu gnas par byed pa yin/ /de lta min na dngos gcig la/ /sna tshogs ngo bo snang ba yi/ /rnam par ji ltar bden 'gyur te/ /gcig pa nyid de nyams par 'ong/ /chos dang
285b1(mdo 'grel): chos can rnam bzhag dang/ /tha dad tha dad min ci 'dra/ /yang dag nyid don ma brtags kyi/ /'jig rten ji ltar grags pa la/ /de bzhin de la brten nas ni/ /bsgrub bya sgrub byed rab gnas pa/ /don dam nyid la 'jug bya phyir/ /mkhas par brtags
285b2(mdo 'grel): pa yin zhe'o/ /'on kyang ji ste don dam par/ /tshad ma la sogs med na ni/ /tha snyad du yang de'i 'jug pa/ /'jig pa min zhes khyed sems na/ /blo de ngan te gang dag gis/ /de ldog pa na 'di ldog pa/ /yang dag ngo bo tha snyad la/ /khyab par nges
285b3(mdo 'grel): pa ma yin no/ /rmi lam la sogs de bzhin du/ /brdzun pa yin yang 'di dag snang/ /sprul pa nyid kyis 'gog la sogs/ /ji lta ba bzhin 'dod pa yin/ /ji ste chos la sogs pa la/ /don dam grags pa'i yin na ni/ /de tshe 'di la ci phyir rtsod/ /
285b4(mdo 'grel): gtan tshigs rnams kyis bsgrub ci dgos/ /ji steng nga la gtan tshigs dang/ /chos can la sogs ma grub na/ /khyed kyis gang gi sgrub pa smos/ /de 'grub 'dod pa'i rjes 'brang min/ /ji ltar chos can ma grub par/ /'gyur ba nged la khyed byed
285b5(mdo 'grel): pa/ /de bzhin deng kyang khyed cag gi /dngos po ma grub sgrub par byed/ /tshad mas grub pa'i yin na ni/ /yod par khas blang rung bar 'dod/ /dpyod pa 'jug pa'i snga rol tu/ /grub pa'i mdza' ni gang yang med/ /de bas dpyod pa'i dus na ni/
285b6(mdo 'grel): grub mdza' rten ni 'ga' med na/ /de yi sgo nas chos can sogs/ /ma grub rtsod par su zhig byed/ /rang la grub mdza' rnam nges nas/ /gzhan dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /'jug pa min nam de bas na/ /grub mdza' khas len snga nas
285b7(mdo 'grel): gnas/ /rgol ba rang la rnam nges bzhin/ /gzhan gyis nges pa bskyid 'dod pas/ /de tshe gtan tshigs dpe dag ni/ /rab tu sbyor ba ma yin nam/ /rang la de nges byed pa na/ /grub mdza' khas len sngar ma yin/ /de bzhin gzhan rtog de
286a1(mdo 'grel): byed pa/ /lung la ji ltar brten par 'gyur/ /tha snyad du yang chos can sogs/ /'ga' yang gang la ma grub pa/ /de tshe chos can ma grub sogs/ /rtsod par sbyor ba rigs pa yin/ /mi 'khrul ba yi gtan tshigs
286a2(mdo 'grel): kyis/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i don grub kyang/ /grub mdza' khas blang dgos phyir ro/ /mi 'grub ces pa gzhung re che/ de bas grub mdza' las grub pa'i /chos can la brten mkhas mi byed/ /de lta bu yi rnam pa ni/ /kun la phan tshun ma grub
286a3(mdo 'grel): phyir/ /gzhi ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs dang/ /de bzhin bsgrub bya rjes 'gro med/ /rgol ba de dang slar rgol ba/ /gnyi ga la yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sgra sogs chos can bde gshegs pas/ /'byung ba las gyur la sogs par/ ji
286a4(mdo 'grel): ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du/ /grangs can gzhan sogs de 'dod med/ /de bas gzhung lugs kyis bskyed pa'i/ /bye brag chos can rnam gsal nas/ /gnag rdzi yan chad grags pa la/ /brten nas tshad ma la sogs pa/ /yang dag rtogs
286a5(mdo 'grel): par 'dod pa yi/ /mkhas pa kun gyis de skad brjod/ /de bzhin bdag gi gzugs sgra dang/ /rol sogs pa grags pa la/ /ji ltar 'jig rten grags pa yi/ /rtogs par byed pa'i gtan tshigs kyis/ /don dam pa la 'jug
286a6(mdo 'grel): pa phyir/ /yang dag bsam pa rgyas par byed/ /des na grub mdza' las grub pa'i/ chos can dag la brten nas ni/ /gzhi ma grub pa la sogs par/ /rgol ba gang yin de 'brel med/ /gzhan yang dngos por ngo bo nyid/ /yin pa'i
286a7(mdo 'grel): sgo nas gang du bsgrub/ de la chos can dngos po yi/ /ngo bo yin zhes brtsal ba'i rigs/ /de ma grub na bsgrub bya ba/ /rab tu grub pa'i bgegs byed phyir/ /gzhi ma grub pa la sogs pa'i/ /skyon yang der ni brjod par byed/ /rtag pa
286b1(mdo 'grel): phyir ro/ /des na gang la la dag na re khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i dngos po'ang la ma grub pa'i phyir gtan tshigs ma grub pa yin no/ /de bzhin du chos can gang kho na la khyab par byed pa dang/ khyab par bya ba'i dngos po grub pa kho na la khyab par
286b2(mdo 'grel): byed pa log pas khyab par bya ba ldog pa ma grub po zhes zer ba de dag thams cad la lan bdab pa kho na yin no/ /'di ltar khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i dngos po la sogs pa thams cad ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten nas phyir bzhag go
286b3(mdo 'grel): zhes sngar bstan zin to/ /khyab par byed pa nye na gdon mi za bar khyab par bya ba bye brag rtogs pa yang ma yin no zhes de yang sngar bstan pa nyid do/ /de'i phyir tha snyad kyi sgo nas gcig dang du ma'i ngo bo dag gis ngo bo nyid dang bcas pa tsam la khyab
286b4(mdo 'grel): mod kyi/ 'on kyang de las don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid du nges pa ni ma yin te/ bum pa la sogs pa gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin can kun rdzob pa yang snang ba'i phyir ro/ /khyad par du na khyab par byed pa dang/ khyab par bya ba'i dngos po 'grub pa ni
286b5(mdo 'grel): tha snyad pa'i chos can la brten pa yin la/ khyab par byed pa ldog pa ni don dam pa la brten pa'i rtsod pa'i gzhir gyur pa'i chos can thams cad la spyir sgrub pa'i phyir 'di gnyis chos can gcig la brten pa nyid lta ga la yin/ chos
286b6(mdo 'grel): can gcig la brten pa nyid yin du chug na yang/ 'on kyang bltos pas tha dad pa'i phyir nyes pa med pa kho na ste/ 'di ltar khyab par byed pa dang khyab par bya ba'i dngos po grub pa ni tha snyad kyi bden pa la brten pa yin la/ khyab
286b7(mdo 'grel): par byed pa ldog pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa la brten pa yin pas 'gal re skan/ gang yang sgrub par bya ba dang sgrub pa dag ci med par dgag pa'i ngo bo zhig yin nam/ 'on te ma yin pa'i ngo bo yin/ phyogs dang po ltar yin na ni de
287a1(mdo 'grel): sgrub pa nyid yin pas/ /ji ste de 'dir mi 'byung na/ /tshad ma med na de yi tshe/ /med pa'i tha snyad 'dir mi 'gyur/ /thal ba'ang tshad ma yin na ni/ /'di la de skyon cing mi 'byung/ /rang dga' i dbang gis yul rtag tu/ /rigs
287a2(mdo 'grel): par ldan pa ma yin no/ /'on te yang ni de la bzhi/ /blo yod pa nyid chos can yin/ /phyi dang gtso bo la sogs pas/ /de la bskyed bya nyid 'gog na/ /de ltar yin na de dag pa phyir/ /nus pa stong pa nyid dang ni/ /gcig dang du ma bral la sogs//
287a3(mdo 'grel): de lta ji ltar ri tshad ma 'grub/ /gtan tshigs rang nyid ma grub par/ /de la bsgrub bya sgrub mi byed/ /grub na'ang de bzhin blo nyid kyang/ /rang bzhin med par ci mi 'gyur/ /so sor brtags pa'i 'gog la sogs/ /ji ste byed rgyur kun brtags pa/ /de
287a4(mdo 'grel): dgag pa la ji ltar blo/ /chos can nyid du brtag par bya/ /phyi dang gtso bo la sogs pas/ /de la bskyed bya nyid bkag kyang/ /phyi rol la sogs stong pa nyid/ /ji ltar gcig tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /'on te thog ma med pa yi/ /rang gi sa
287a5(mdo 'grel): bon las byung ba/ /rnam rtog mthar gtugs blo la yod/ /chos can la brten gtso sogs 'gog /phyi rol bzhin du phyi rol sogs/ /tha dad med bzhin de la rtog /gcig dang du ma dben pa dang/ /nus pa med pa bzhin du mthong/ /shin tu
287a6(mdo 'grel): dngos med de grub na/ /phyi rol la sogs stong nyid 'grub/ /bsgrub par bya dang sgrub byed pa/ /gzhi gcig pa yang yod pa yin/ /phyi rol la sogs kun brtags pa'i/ /rang bzhin de ni rab tu 'gog /de nyid dgag par bya ba'i phyir/ /sgrub pa la
287a7(mdo 'grel): sogs byed pa min/ /rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa'i/ /tha snyad thams cad der brten te/ /don dam nyid la 'jug bya phyir/ /rigs pa smra ba rnams kyis byas/ /ji ste brdzun pa kun brtags pa'o/ /chos can la yang tha snyad 'di/ /'dod na ci phyir
287b1(mdo 'grel): rdul du du ma'ang min zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin du/ dngos rnams gang du rnams dpyad na/ /de yi ngo bor yang dag med/ /gang gi phyir na de dag la/ /gcig dang du ma'i ngo bo med/ /ces bya ba la sogs pas phyi'i don la sogs pa kun brtags
287b2(mdo 'grel): pa 'gog pa de la yang klan ka 'di ci ste 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ gal te yang ngo bo nyid med pa la go bar byed pa nyid med na de'i tshe rta'i rwa go bar byed pa ma yin pa nyid kyang ci ste nye bar dgod/ khyod kyi nye bar brjod pa thams cad dang bral
287b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni cung zad kyang go bar mi byed ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba de nyid la yang bsgrub par bya ba dang/ sgrub par byed pa dgag pa'i ngo bo dag ji ltar go bar bya ba dang/ go bar byed pa'i dngos po yin/ de la
287b4(mdo 'grel): bas na sbyor ba 'di ni mtshon cha'i thabs bslab nyes par byed pa bzhin du rang la gnod par byed pa nye bar bkod pa 'ba' zhig du zad pas/ /sbyor ba la te por mkhas pa yang ma yin no/ /thams cad kyi dngos po thams cad rtag tu gtan
287b5(mdo 'grel): la 'bebs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir rtags dngos por gyur pa kho na go bar byed pa nyid du ni su yang mi 'dod de/ gdon mi za bar gang yang rung ba la rtags gang yang rung ba zhig go bar byed par gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /de lta bas na
287b6(mdo 'grel): rtag nges pa kho na mngon sum du go bar byed pa yin te/ bsgrub par bya ba'i rnam pa la nges pa skyod pa'i phyir ro/ /rtags ni nye bar 'dogs pa'i sgo kho na nas go bar byed par bzhag go zhes bya bar rig ste/ des na rtags ngo bo med pa yin
287b7(mdo 'grel): yang de'i rnam par nges pa ni 'dod pa'i ba sgrub par bya ba'i rnam pa gtan la 'bebs pa skye ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir go bar byed pa nyid du nye bar brtags pas nyes pa med do/ /thams cad du rtags dngos por gyur pa kho na dgod pa yang
288a1(mdo 'grel): rigs pas phyis 'dir bshad/ /phyin ci log gi blo rnams kyi/ /dmigs pa yang dag mthong yin nam/ /yang dag don ni grub bya'i phyir/ /tshad ma rjod par byed dam ci/ /dang tho re zhig ma nges te/ /'gal ba dag kyang mthong ba
288a2(mdo 'grel): yin/ /rab rib can gyi skra la sogs/ /mthong ba bden par gyur pa med/ /gnyis pa yang ni tshad ma dang/ /lung las grub pa ma yin no/ /chos rnams ma mthong gang yin pa/ /yang dag shes par bstan ma thag /mngon sum pas mi grub pa
